programme.title: Australian Story
programme.desc: Jim Rogers has always been a big personality so when he was diagnosed with Alzheimers, he wasnt going to keep quiet. Now hes become the poster boy for dementia, determined to speak out.

programme.title: Compass
programme.desc: With the rise of race-based attacks in Gaza, Australias Jewish and Muslim communities are traumatised. Benjamin Law discovers how some friendships have fractured, while others are strengthened.

programme.title: If Youre Listening
programme.sub-title: Trump and Elons Big Beautiful Breakup
programme.desc: Trumps hes fighting with his former first buddy Elon, judges are overruling his executive orders and there are protests in the streets of LA. So where did it all go wrong?

programme.title: Gruen
programme.desc: Tonight on Gruen, we get lost in Aldi and buy a bottle of CLR, a packet of talking crumpets and the latest must-have fashion accessory - a water bottle. Wil, Todd and Russel are joined by Karen Ferry and Renata Yannoulis.

programme.title: ABC News at Noon
programme.desc: Ros Childs presents the leading news at lunchtime, including the days top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter.

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: Sister Julienne and Shelagh are thrilled that the new midwifery training scheme is underway, which includes pupil midwives Rosalind Clifford, Joyce Highland, Kathy Downes and Norelle Morris.

programme.title: Restoration Australia
programme.desc: Host Anthony Burke meets a big city couple aiming to bring a slouching country town mansion back to the burnished glory of its gold rush years.

programme.title: Claire Hoopers House of Games
programme.desc: Swinging by Claire Hoopers House of Games this week, weve got cook Khanh Ong, radio host Lawrence Mooney, and comedians Tom Ballard and Emma Holland finding out whos smart enough to take home the trophy and a neck pillow.

programme.title: Anhs Brush With Fame
programme.desc: French chef Manu Feildels passion for entertaining has made him a regular on our TV screens over the last decade. Anh captures the desire, determination and flair of a man who has worked hard for every opportunity.

programme.title: Love Your Garden
programme.desc: Alan and his team transform the Cumbrian garden of the Pyne family, who lost their daughter to cancer. Will they finish the garden on time and will it give the Pynes their dream garden?

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Brothers, David and Paul, are searching for their father who disappeared from their lives when they were young boys. Mother of two, Julia, is desperate to find her own mother who she has never known.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team find themselves in the middle of a tank firing range as the roadshow sets up camp at Lulworth Castle in Dorset. Among the finds is a rare copy of the abdication papers of Edward VIII.

programme.title: Claire Hoopers House of Games
programme.desc: Swinging by Claire Hoopers House of Games this week, weve got cook Khanh Ong, radio host Lawrence Mooney, and comedians Tom Ballard and Emma Holland finding out whos smart enough to take home the trophy and a neck pillow.

programme.title: ABC National News
programme.desc: Theres never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the days top stories and latest news, with more reporters to tell you whats going on and why it matters. Presented by Lorna Dunkley.
Sarah Ferguson presents Australias premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: A gang of armoured dinosaurs battles to reach adulthood, pursued by ferocious raptors.

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Great Barrier Reef
programme.desc: David descends beneath the waves in the state-of-the-art submersible, the first of its kind to visit the reef. He meets some of the tiny coral animals who built the reef, turning it into an underwater wonderland.

programme.title: I Was Actually There
programme.desc: Its a day etched into Australian sporting folklore for all the wrong reasons. A moment on a footy field where Nicky Winmar, a proud Noongar man, called out racism.

programme.title: Four Corners
programme.desc: As the US launches a review into AUKUS, we examine the $368 billion submarine deal. Mark Willacy speaks with key players inside the US Congress and the defence community, UK figures warn of cost blowouts and delays.

programme.title: Media Watch
programme.desc: LA protests cast a shadow over press safety in the age of Trump; The drone advocate who happens to also be a drone investor; Plus a prominent reporters secret trip bankrolled by a major defence company.

programme.title: Evacuation
programme.desc: When allied forces begin to return home from Afghanistan, the Taliban start taking back parts of the country. A small team of British military are sent out to prepare for a possible evacuation.

programme.title: Love Your Garden
programme.desc: Alan and his team transform the Cumbrian garden of the Pyne family, who lost their daughter to cancer. Will they finish the garden on time and will it give the Pynes their dream garden?

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Brothers, David and Paul, are searching for their father who disappeared from their lives when they were young boys. Mother of two, Julia, is desperate to find her own mother who she has never known.

programme.title: rage
programme.desc: Australias longest-running music show is home to the biggest vault of music videos from a diverse range of artists, genres, and eras. They curate the best clips of all-time to entertain for hours.

programme.title: Parkinson In Australia
programme.sub-title: 1979: Don Lane, Marcia Hines and Frank Thring
programme.desc: Classic Australian entertainment as we take a trip back to 1979 where Michael Parkinson interviews guests Don Lane, Marcia Hines and Frank Thring.

programme.title: Gardening Australia
programme.desc: Costa picks perfect citrus; Millie tours a designers colourful garden; Tammy sets up hydroponics; Clarence sees weeds turned to art; Sophie visits a cooling garden; the team learn about one of Australias most prolific botanists.
Sarah Ferguson presents Australias premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account.

programme.title: News Breakfast
programme.desc: As the day begins get the facts you need to stay informed. James Glenday and Emma Rebellato present the latest news, overnight developments and todays top stories plus Catherine Murphy with sport and Nate Byrne with weather.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings
programme.desc: Stay in the know with whats happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: Four Corners
programme.desc: As the US launches a review into AUKUS, we examine the $368 billion submarine deal. Mark Willacy speaks with key players inside the US Congress and the defence community, UK figures warn of cost blowouts and delays.

programme.title: Long Lost Family: Born Without Trace
programme.desc: The extraordinary stories of two foundlings: a man who was left in a corned beef box outside a railway tavern in Greenhithe, and a woman found at just hours old in a ladies public toilet in Warminster. (Final)

programme.title: ABC News at Noon
programme.desc: Ros Childs presents the leading news at lunchtime, including the days top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter.

programme.title: National Press Club Address
programme.desc: Treasurer of Australia Jim Chalmers addresses the National Press Club on the topic "Our Second Term Economic Agenda".

programme.title: Media Watch
programme.desc: LA protests cast a shadow over press safety in the age of Trump; The drone advocate who happens to also be a drone investor; Plus a prominent reporters secret trip bankrolled by a major defence company.

programme.title: Restoration Australia
programme.desc: Host Anthony Burke joins a young couple, Steph and Paul, as they set out bravely and optimistically to write a happy, luxe new chapter for a storied 150-year-old Melbourne institution.

programme.title: Claire Hoopers House of Games
programme.desc: Swinging by Claire Hoopers House of Games this week, weve got cook Khanh Ong, radio host Lawrence Mooney, and comedians Tom Ballard and Emma Holland finding out whos smart enough to take home the trophy and a neck pillow.

programme.title: Anhs Brush With Fame
programme.desc: Maos Last Dancer Li Cunxin shares his incredible journey from extreme poverty in communist China to principal dancer on the world ballet stage. Can Anh capture his poise and humility?

programme.title: Love Your Garden
programme.desc: Alan and his team come to the rescue of an inspirational family in Manchester whose much needed garden has become a no go area. David Domoney shows us how to make a tired old deck look as good as new.

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: A long distance truck driver, Laurence was given up for adoption at birth. The story of Denise, desperate to find her daughter who she gave birth to nearly 50 years ago.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team set up for another busy day in the grounds of Hever Castle in Kent. Despite occasional downpours, thick crowds unpack their heirlooms for the experts.

programme.title: Claire Hoopers House of Games
programme.desc: Swinging by Claire Hoopers House of Games this week, weve got cook Khanh Ong, radio host Lawrence Mooney, and comedians Tom Ballard and Emma Holland finding out whos smart enough to take home the trophy and a neck pillow.

Sarah Ferguson presents Australias premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account.

programme.title: Gruen
programme.desc: Advertising has changed for the worse. Gruen has changed for the better. Join Wil Anderson, Todd Sampson, Russel Howcroft and a panel for a new and improved look at a world of advertising which isnt new nor improved.

programme.title: Guy Montgomerys Guy Mont-Spelling Bee
programme.desc: Guy and Aaron put a new panel of contestants to the test. Rove McManus, He Huang and Emma Holland and the carryover champion attempt to Spell the Difference, and spell to make their Hometowns proud.

programme.title: Planet America
programme.desc: Chas and John discuss the Israel-Iran Conflict, No Kings protests, Trumps military parade, the Minnesota shootings, the G7 Summit in Canada and Trumps anticipated meeting with Anthony Albanese over tariffs and AUKUS.

programme.title: Spicks and Specks
programme.desc: Celebrating 20 years, Spicks returns! Joining Adam, Alan and Myf are singer Charlie Collins, comedian Rhys Nicholson, hot wiggle John Pearce and comedian Sara Pascoe. The Living End close the show and Barry Morgan returns.

programme.title: QI
programme.desc: Join Sandi Toksvig for a Visual episode of QI with Maisie Adam, Jack Dee, Kiri Pritchard-McLean, and Alan Davies.

programme.title: You Cant Ask That
programme.desc: The thought provoking series returns to give marginalised and misunderstood Australians a voice. In this episode, we gain an unprecedented insight into the minds of people who have attempted suicide and survived.

programme.title: You Cant Ask That
programme.desc: This program asks recent war veterans the awkward, inappropriate or uncomfortable questions youve always wanted to know the answers to, but never had the guts to ask.

programme.title: Love Your Garden
programme.desc: Alan and his team come to the rescue of an inspirational family in Manchester whose much needed garden has become a no go area. David Domoney shows us how to make a tired old deck look as good as new.

programme.title: Parkinson In Australia
programme.sub-title: 1979: Phillip Adams, Harry Butler, Lloyd Rees
programme.desc: Take a trip back to 1979 when Michael Parkinson interviews guests Phillip Adams, Harry Butler and Lloyd Rees.

programme.title: Gardening Australia
programme.desc: Costa plants potatoes in pots; Jane visits an eremophila expert; Tino meets migrant gardeners; Sophie plants for pollinators; Josh reclaims a garden bed; meeting a colourful collage artist.
Sarah Ferguson presents Australias premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account.

programme.title: News Breakfast
programme.desc: As the day begins get the facts you need to stay informed. James Glenday and Emma Rebellato present the latest news, overnight developments and todays top stories plus Catherine Murphy with sport and Nate Byrne with weather.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings
programme.desc: Stay in the know with whats going on this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Meredith Sheehan.

programme.title: Stuff the British Stole
programme.desc: For well over a century the remains of Yagan, an Indigenous Noongar warrior from WA, were missing in the UK. The search for Yagan and the fight to bring him home is one of historys wildest detective stories. (Final)

programme.title: Back Roads
programme.desc: We travel to Charlton in north-west Victoria, for an event like no other. A festival that brings locals and blow-ins together, creating lasting friendship in one big weekend of live music and country hospitality.

programme.title: Guy Montgomerys Guy Mont-Spelling Bee
programme.desc: Guy and Aaron put a new panel of contestants to the test. Rove McManus, He Huang and Emma Holland and the carryover champion attempt to Spell the Difference, and spell to make their Hometowns proud.

programme.title: ABC News at Noon
programme.desc: Ros Childs presents the leading news at lunchtime, including the days top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter.

programme.title: The One That Got Away
programme.desc: Investigations intensify as the school gunman is connected to the historic case.

programme.title: Restoration Australia
programme.desc: In Orange NSW, first responders Chris and Mel have found all the cosmopolitan comforts of city living along with fresh air, big skies, open spaces and a sweet Edwardian fixer-upper called Bega.

programme.title: Claire Hoopers House of Games
programme.desc: Swinging by Claire Hoopers House of Games this week, weve got cook Khanh Ong, radio host Lawrence Mooney, and comedians Tom Ballard and Emma Holland finding out whos smart enough to take home the trophy and a neck pillow.

programme.title: Anhs Brush With Fame
programme.desc: Much loved singer-songwriter Missy Higgins opens up to Anh about her meteoric rise from schoolgirl to chart-topper, and the emotional stories behind her music. How will Anh capture her warmth and humility?

programme.title: Love Your Garden
programme.desc: Alan and his team come to the aid of a family who were able to move on from the tragic loss of their young son by founding a charity to support other bereaved families.

programme.title: Troy
programme.desc: It is the year 1250 BC, during the late Bronze Age. Two emerging nations begin to clash after Paris, the Trojan prince, convinces Helen, Queen of Sparta, to leave her husband Menelaus, and sail with him back to Troy. After Menelaus finds out that his wife was taken by the Trojans, he asks his brother Agamemnon to help him get her back. Agamemnon sees this as an opportunity for power. So they set off for Troy with 1000 ships holding 50,000 Greeks. With the help of Achilles, the Greeks are able to fight the never-before-defeated Trojans, but they come to a stop by Hector, Prince of Troy.

programme.title: World War Z
programme.desc: The story revolves around United Nations employee Gerry Lane, who traverses the world in a race against time to stop a pandemic that is toppling armies and governments and threatening to decimate humanity itself.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A military cop becomes involved in a deadly game of cat-and-mouse when five people are randomly murdered by a sniper.

programme.title: Transformers: Dark of the Moon
programme.desc: A mysterious event from Earths past threatens to ignite a war so big that the Transformers alone will not be able to save the planet. Sam Witwicky and the Autobots must fight against the darkness to defend our world from the Decepticons all-consuming evil.

programme.title: Pacific Rim: Uprising
programme.desc: The globe-spanning conflict between otherworldly monsters of mass destruction and the human-piloted supermachines built to vanquish them was only a prelude to the all-out assault on humanity in "Pacific Rim Uprising." Jake Pentecost, is a once-promising Jaeger pilot whose legendary father gave his life to secure humanitys victory against the monstrous "Kaiju." Jake has since abandoned his training only to become caught up in a criminal underworld. But when an even more unstoppable threat is unleashed to tear through our cities and bring the world to its knees, he is given one last chance to live up to his fathers legacy by his estranged sister, Mako Mori who is leading a brave new generation of pilots that have grown up in the shadow of war. As they seek justice for the fallen, their only hope is to unite together in a global uprising against the forces of extinction.

programme.title: The Prestige
programme.desc: The mysterious story of two magicians whose intense rivalry leads them on a lifelong battle for supremacy full of obsession, deceit, and jealousy with dangerous and deadly consequences. From the time that they first met as young magicians on the rise, Robert Anglier and Alfred Borden were competitors. However, their friendly competition evolves into a bitter rivalry making them fierce enemies-for-life and consequently jeopardising the lives of everyone around them. Full of twists and turns, this film is set against the backdrop of turn-of-the-century London.

programme.title: Charlies Angels: Full Throttle
programme.desc: The Angels, three investigative agents (Barrymore, Diaz and Liu) who work for the Charles Townsend Detective Agency, return for another high-octane series of adventures as they investigate the theft of a database of witness protection profiles, after five of the people on the list are murdered. Theyre aided by a new Bosley (Bernie Mac), in an adventure which pits them against a fallen angel (Moore), their old nemesis, the Thin Man (Glover), and others.

programme.title: Halloween Kills
programme.desc: Survivors of Michael Myers first rampage decide to take matters into their own hands, forming a vigilante mob that sets out to hunt Michael down, once and for all.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible III
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt must bring down a ruthless villain and rescue his fiancee.

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: Based on the classic Hasbro naval combat game, this is the story of an international fleet of ships that come across an alien armada while on naval war games exercise.

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: A spacecraft transporting thousands of people to a distant planet has a malfunction in its sleep chambers, and as a result two passengers are awakened 90 years too early.

programme.title: The Italian Job
programme.desc: The plan was flawless. The execution was perfect. Charlie Croker pulled off the crime of a lifetime. The one thing that, he didnt plan on was being double-crossed. Now he wants more than the jobs payoff he wants payback.

programme.title: Charlies Angels
programme.desc: When a devious mastermind embroils them in a plot to destroy individual privacy, the Angels, aided by their loyal sidekick Bosley, set out to bring down the bad guys. But when a terrible secret is revealed, it makes the Angels targets for assassination.

programme.title: Uncharted
programme.desc: Street-smart Nathan Drake is recruited by seasoned treasure hunter Victor Sully Sullivan to recover a fortune amassed by Ferdinand Magellan, and lost 500 years ago.

programme.title: Doom
programme.desc: A frantic call for help from a remote research station on Mars sends a team of mercenary Marines into action. The team descends into the Olduvai Research Station, where they find a legion of nightmarish creatures, lurking in the darkness, killing at will. Once there, the Marines must use an arsenal of firepower to carry out their mission: nothing gets out alive.

programme.title: Transformers: Age of Extinction
programme.desc: This film begins after an epic battle left a great city torn, but with the world saved. As humanity picks up the pieces, a shadowy group reveals itself in an attempt to control the direction of history while an ancient, powerful new menace sets Earth in its crosshairs. With help from a new cast of humans, Optimus Prime and the Autobots rise to meet their most fearsome challenge yet. In an incredible adventure, they are swept up in a war of good and evil, ultimately leading to a climactic battle across the world.

programme.title: War Of The Worlds (2005)
programme.desc: Ray Ferrier is a working class man living in New Jersey. Hes estranged from his family, his life isnt in order, and hes too caught up with himself. But the unthinkable and ultimately the unexpected happens to him in an extraordinary sense. His small town life is shaken violently by the arrival of destructive intruders: Aliens which have come in masses to destroy the planet. As they plough through the country in a wave of mass destruction and violence, Ray must come to the defence of his children. As the world must fend for itself by a new and very advanced enemy not of this world, its inhabitants must save humanity from a far greater force than threatens to destroy it.

programme.title: Warcraft: The Beginning
programme.desc: The peaceful realm of Azeroth stands on the brink of war as its civilisation faces a fearsome race of invaders: Orc warriors fleeing their dying home to colonise another. As a portal opens to connect the two worlds, one army faces destruction and the other faces extinction. From opposing sides, two heroes are set on a collision course that will decide the fate of their family, their people and their home. So begins a spectacular saga of power and sacrifice in which war has many faces, and everyone fights for something.

programme.title: The Dark Knight
programme.desc: With the help of Lt. Jim Gordon and District Attorney Harvey Dent, Batman sets out to destroy organised crime in Gotham for good. The triumvirate proves effective, but soon find themselves prey to a rising criminal mastermind known as The Joker, who thrusts Gotham into anarchy and forces Batman closer to crossing the fine line between hero and vigilante.

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
programme.desc: When convicted street racer Sean Boswell tries to start a new life on the other side of the world, his obsession with racing sets him on a collision course with the Japanese underworld. To survive, he will have to master drifting - a new style of racing where tricked-out cars slide through hairpin turns, defying gravity and death for the ultimate road rush.

programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.desc: When a renegade Kylothian monster disguised as a lingerie model threatens the survival of the human race, the boys of the MIB get the call to step up and get busy. With their headquarters under siege and time running out, Agents K and J enlist the help of Frank the Pug and a posse of hard-living worms to help them kick some seriously sexy alien butt!

programme.title: Charlies Angels (2019)
programme.desc: In this next generation, the worlds most highly trained women all over the globe are now teams of Angels guided by multiple Bosleys taking on the toughest jobs everywhere.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winters War
programme.desc: Evil Queen Ravenna betrays her good sister, Freya, with an unforgivable act, freezing Freyas heart of love and unleashing in her an icy power she never knew she possessed. Retreating to a kingdom far to the north, Freya raises an army of Huntsmen as her protectors, with the only rule that no two of them should ever fall in love.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
programme.desc: On a dangerous assignment to recover stolen plutonium, Ethan Hunt chooses to save his team over completing the mission, allowing nuclear weapons to fall into the hands of a deadly network of highly-skilled operatives intent on destroying civilization. Now, with the world at risk, Ethan and his IMF team are forced to become reluctant partners with a hard-hitting CIA agent as they race against time to stop the nuclear fallout. Theres never been a threat more destructive, stunts so jaw-dropping in the film critics are calling the best "Mission" yet!

programme.title: Venom: Let There Be Carnage
programme.desc: In search of his next big story, Eddie lands an exclusive interview with convicted murderer and death row inmate Cletus Kasady,

programme.title: Men in Black
programme.desc: Men in Black follows the exploits of Agents Kay and Jay, members of a top-secret organization established to monitor alien activity on Earth. The two MIB find themselves in the middle of a deadly plot by an intergalactic terrorist, who has arrived on Earth to assassinate two ambassadors from opposing galaxies. Kay and Jay face a simple imperative: track down the interloper or Earth will be destroyed. Its all in a days work for the Men in Black.

programme.title: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
programme.desc: The OConnells must stop a mummy awoken from a 2000-year-old curse who threatens to plunge the world into his merciless, unending service. Doomed by a wronged sorceress, Zi Yuan, to spend eternity in suspended animation, the ruthless Dragon Emperor and his 10,000 warriors have laid forgotten for eons, entombed in clay as a vast, silent Terracotta Army.

programme.title: Troy

programme.desc: This film begins after an epic battle left a great city torn, but with the world saved. With help from a new cast of humans, Optimus Prime and the Autobots rise to meet their most fearsome challenge yet. In an incredible adventure, they are swept up in a war of good and evil, ultimately leading to a climactic battle across the world.

programme.title: War Of The Worlds (2005)
programme.desc: Ray Ferrier is a working class man living in New Jersey. Hes estranged from his family, his life isnt in order, and hes too caught up with himself. But the unthinkable and ultimately the unexpected happens to him in an extraordinary sense. His small town life is shaken violently by the arrival of destructive intruders: Aliens which have come in masses to destroy the planet. As they plough through the country in a wave of mass destruction and violence, Ray must come to the defence of his children. As the world must fend for itself by a new and very advanced enemy not of this world, its inhabitants must save humanity from a far greater force than threatens to destroy it.

programme.title: Warcraft: The Beginning
programme.desc: The peaceful realm of Azeroth stands on the brink of war as its civilisation faces a fearsome race of invaders: Orc warriors fleeing their dying home to colonise another. As a portal opens to connect the two worlds, one army faces destruction and the other faces extinction. From opposing sides, two heroes are set on a collision course that will decide the fate of their family, their people and their home. So begins a spectacular saga of power and sacrifice in which war has many faces, and everyone fights for something.

programme.title: The Dark Knight
programme.desc: With the help of Lt. Jim Gordon and District Attorney Harvey Dent, Batman sets out to destroy organised crime in Gotham for good. The triumvirate proves effective, but soon find themselves prey to a rising criminal mastermind known as The Joker, who thrusts Gotham into anarchy and forces Batman closer to crossing the fine line between hero and vigilante.

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
programme.desc: When convicted street racer Sean Boswell tries to start a new life on the other side of the world, his obsession with racing sets him on a collision course with the Japanese underworld. To survive, he will have to master drifting - a new style of racing where tricked-out cars slide through hairpin turns, defying gravity and death for the ultimate road rush.

programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.desc: When a renegade Kylothian monster disguised as a lingerie model threatens the survival of the human race, the boys of the MIB get the call to step up and get busy. With their headquarters under siege and time running out, Agents K and J enlist the help of Frank the Pug and a posse of hard-living worms to help them kick some seriously sexy alien butt!

programme.title: Charlies Angels (2019)
programme.desc: In this next generation, the worlds most highly trained women all over the globe are now teams of Angels guided by multiple Bosleys taking on the toughest jobs everywhere.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winters War
programme.desc: Evil Queen Ravenna betrays her good sister, Freya, with an unforgivable act, freezing Freyas heart of love and unleashing in her an icy power she never knew she possessed. Retreating to a kingdom far to the north, Freya raises an army of Huntsmen as her protectors, with the only rule that no two of them should ever fall in love.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
programme.desc: On a dangerous assignment to recover stolen plutonium, Ethan Hunt chooses to save his team over completing the mission, allowing nuclear weapons to fall into the hands of a deadly network of highly-skilled operatives intent on destroying civilization. Now, with the world at risk, Ethan and his IMF team are forced to become reluctant partners with a hard-hitting CIA agent as they race against time to stop the nuclear fallout. Theres never been a threat more destructive, stunts so jaw-dropping in the film critics are calling the best "Mission" yet!

programme.title: Venom: Let There Be Carnage
programme.desc: In search of his next big story, Eddie lands an exclusive interview with convicted murderer and death row inmate Cletus Kasady,

programme.title: Men in Black
programme.desc: Men in Black follows the exploits of Agents Kay and Jay, members of a top-secret organization established to monitor alien activity on Earth. The two MIB find themselves in the middle of a deadly plot by an intergalactic terrorist, who has arrived on Earth to assassinate two ambassadors from opposing galaxies. Kay and Jay face a simple imperative: track down the interloper or Earth will be destroyed. Its all in a days work for the Men in Black.

programme.title: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
programme.desc: The OConnells must stop a mummy awoken from a 2000-year-old curse who threatens to plunge the world into his merciless, unending service. Doomed by a wronged sorceress, Zi Yuan, to spend eternity in suspended animation, the ruthless Dragon Emperor and his 10,000 warriors have laid forgotten for eons, entombed in clay as a vast, silent Terracotta Army.

programme.title: The Mummy Returns
programme.desc: When a chain of events finds the corpse of Imhotep resurrected in the British Museum, the mummy walks the Earth once more, determined to fulfil his quest for immortality. An even more powerful force born of the darkest rituals of ancient Egypt has also been set loose in the world. When these two forces clash, the fate of the world will hang in the balance, sending the OConnells on a desperate race to save the world.

programme.title: Troy
programme.desc: It is the year 1250 BC, during the late Bronze Age. Two emerging nations begin to clash after Paris, the Trojan prince, convinces Helen, Queen of Sparta, to leave her husband Menelaus, and sail with him back to Troy. After Menelaus finds out that his wife was taken by the Trojans, he asks his brother Agamemnon to help him get her back. Agamemnon sees this as an opportunity for power. So they set off for Troy with 1000 ships holding 50,000 Greeks. With the help of Achilles, the Greeks are able to fight the never-before-defeated Trojans, but they come to a stop by Hector, Prince of Troy.

programme.title: World War Z
programme.desc: The story revolves around United Nations employee Gerry Lane, who traverses the world in a race against time to stop a pandemic that is toppling armies and governments and threatening to decimate humanity itself.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A military cop becomes involved in a deadly game of cat-and-mouse when five people are randomly murdered by a sniper.

programme.title: Transformers: Dark of the Moon
programme.desc: A mysterious event from Earths past threatens to ignite a war so big that the Transformers alone will not be able to save the planet. Sam Witwicky and the Autobots must fight against the darkness to defend our world from the Decepticons all-consuming evil.

programme.title: Pacific Rim: Uprising
programme.desc: The globe-spanning conflict between otherworldly monsters of mass destruction and the human-piloted supermachines built to vanquish them was only a prelude to the all-out assault on humanity in "Pacific Rim Uprising." Jake Pentecost, is a once-promising Jaeger pilot whose legendary father gave his life to secure humanitys victory against the monstrous "Kaiju." Jake has since abandoned his training only to become caught up in a criminal underworld. But when an even more unstoppable threat is unleashed to tear through our cities and bring the world to its knees, he is given one last chance to live up to his fathers legacy by his estranged sister, Mako Mori who is leading a brave new generation of pilots that have grown up in the shadow of war. As they seek justice for the fallen, their only hope is to unite together in a global uprising against the forces of extinction.

programme.title: The Prestige
programme.desc: The mysterious story of two magicians whose intense rivalry leads them on a lifelong battle for supremacy full of obsession, deceit, and jealousy with dangerous and deadly consequences. From the time that they first met as young magicians on the rise, Robert Anglier and Alfred Borden were competitors. However, their friendly competition evolves into a bitter rivalry making them fierce enemies-for-life and consequently jeopardising the lives of everyone around them. Full of twists and turns, this film is set against the backdrop of turn-of-the-century London.

programme.title: Charlies Angels: Full Throttle
programme.desc: The Angels, three investigative agents (Barrymore, Diaz and Liu) who work for the Charles Townsend Detective Agency, return for another high-octane series of adventures as they investigate the theft of a database of witness protection profiles, after five of the people on the list are murdered. Theyre aided by a new Bosley (Bernie Mac), in an adventure which pits them against a fallen angel (Moore), their old nemesis, the Thin Man (Glover), and others.

programme.title: Halloween Kills
programme.desc: Survivors of Michael Myers first rampage decide to take matters into their own hands, forming a vigilante mob that sets out to hunt Michael down, once and for all.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible III
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt must bring down a ruthless villain and rescue his fiancee.

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: Based on the classic Hasbro naval combat game, this is the story of an international fleet of ships that come across an alien armada while on naval war games exercise.

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: A spacecraft transporting thousands of people to a distant planet has a malfunction in its sleep chambers, and as a result two passengers are awakened 90 years too early.

programme.title: The Italian Job
programme.desc: The plan was flawless. The execution was perfect. Charlie Croker pulled off the crime of a lifetime. The one thing that, he didnt plan on was being double-crossed. Now he wants more than the jobs payoff he wants payback.

programme.title: Charlies Angels
programme.desc: When a devious mastermind embroils them in a plot to destroy individual privacy, the Angels, aided by their loyal sidekick Bosley, set out to bring down the bad guys. But when a terrible secret is revealed, it makes the Angels targets for assassination.

programme.title: Uncharted
programme.desc: Street-smart Nathan Drake is recruited by seasoned treasure hunter Victor Sully Sullivan to recover a fortune amassed by Ferdinand Magellan, and lost 500 years ago.

programme.title: Doom
programme.desc: A frantic call for help from a remote research station on Mars sends a team of mercenary Marines into action. The team descends into the Olduvai Research Station, where they find a legion of nightmarish creatures, lurking in the darkness, killing at will. Once there, the Marines must use an arsenal of firepower to carry out their mission: nothing gets out alive.

programme.title: Transformers: Age of Extinction
programme.desc: This film begins after an epic battle left a great city torn, but with the world saved. As humanity picks up the pieces, a shadowy group reveals itself in an attempt to control the direction of history while an ancient, powerful new menace sets Earth in its crosshairs. programme.desc: In her first HBO stand-up comedy special, comedian and actress Atsuko Okatsuka brings her brand of ingenious, offbeat storytelling to the Elsewhere stage in Brooklyn, New York where she dishes on the futile art of impressing teenagers, attending a "Magic Mike Live" show with her grandmother, and the alarming reactions that she and her husband had to the unwanted presence of an intruder.

programme.title: Drew Michael: Red Blue Green
programme.desc: In this hilarious, confessional hour of stand-up, Drew Michael airs his issues with relationships, social media, and comedy as therapy.

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Its the summer season and as part of Roses coming out she is to be presented at Buckingham Palace. The family and servants are at Grantham House, their London residence, preparing for the busy social program. Not one to miss such a grand occasion, Coras mother, Martha Levinson, makes the journey from New York with her playboy son Harold, fresh from his recent brush with the law. Both outspoken and larger-than-life, will they make an impression among certain members of Londons high society? Downstairs, Daisy gets an unexpected invitation and Carson treats the staff to a special day out. But, when the Crawleys are implicated in a scandal that threatens to engulf the monarchy, what lengths will Robert go to in order to protect the royal family, and his own?

programme.title: Line of Duty
programme.desc: A police convoy escorting a civilian under a witness protection scheme is attacked. The witness is hospitalised and all police officers are killed with the exception of Detective Inspector Lindsay Denton, who organised the operation, and only informed DCC Mike Dryden.

programme.title: Line of Duty
programme.desc: Arnott discovers that a nurse on the witnesss ward, Claire Tindall, was threatened into giving the killer access by a man she knows as Joe, whom she is unable to identify. Denton begins her work in missing persons with the case of a vanished 15-year old, Carly Kirk.

programme.desc: Jen introduces Roy and Moss to a new social website, and then finds out why some friendships are best left in the past. Roy does battle with the Joker and Moss asserts his masculinity as Jens temporary husband.

programme.title: Happy Days

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Doug has to pick Arthur up from his job, because Carrie is working late. On the way home, Arthur talks, and talks, and talks. The only way Doug can fix this mess is to take Arthur to a New York Mets baseball game.

programme.desc: The need for house rules arises when Frasier catches Daphnes boyfriend leaving the apartment after staying the night. When Daphne decides to move out, Frasier fears he and his father will kill each other.

programme.desc: When Doug and Carrie go on vacation to celebrate their anniversary, they decide to take their friends Deacon and Kelly which turns out to be a big mistake.

programme.title: Seinfeld
programme.desc: Jerry is coerced into wearing a ridiculous puffy shirt designed by Kramers girlfriend when he appears on NBC news. Guest stars Wendall Meldrum.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Debra becomes angry when Ray contributes $1000, without first consulting her, to his friends harebrained scheme to open a go-cart business.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Marie gathers Roberts ex-girlfriends Amy and Stefania and his female police partner, Judy, together so they can discuss why her eldest son cant commit to a relationship.

programme.title: Mom
programme.desc: In order to avoid her ex-boyfriend, Bonnie drags Christy to a new AA meeting, only to run into her ex-girlfriend, Jeanine, from 30 years ago.

programme.title: The New Adventures of Old Christine
programme.desc: Christine becomes envious as Richard and New Christine plan for their new baby and decides to ask Richard for his help so she can have one too.

programme.title: The New Adventures of Old Christine
programme.desc: Christine is torn over whether to spend her share of the gyms profits on a new dress or on charity, and Matthew discovers that Richard has an embarrassing new job.

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: When Doug and Carrie go on vacation to celebrate their anniversary, they decide to take their friends Deacon and Kelly which turns out to be a big mistake.

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Its double the havoc when Ray and Debra Barone come and visit Doug and Carrie.

programme.title: Seinfeld
programme.desc: Jerry learns an uncomfortable secret about his romance with Elaine.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: For four years, the courageous crew of the NSEA Protector set off on thrilling and often dangerous missions in space and then their series was cancelled! Now, twenty years later, aliens under attack have mistaken the Galaxy Quest television transmissions for "historical documents" and beamed up the crew of has-been actors to save the universe. With no script, no director and no clue, the actors must turn in the performances of their lives.

programme.title: Old School
programme.desc: Three men relive their carefree college years by killing off as many brain cells as possible in this over-the-top comedy. Mitch returns home from a less-than-pleasant business trip one evening to discover his wife, Heidi, involved in a menage a trois with two blindfolded strangers. Feeling less than welcome at home after this, Mitch rents a house near the campus of a nearby college; two of Mitchs old college buddies, Beanie and Frank, stop by to cheer him up. They soon become regular guests at Mitchs place.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses 2
programme.desc: Fed up with answering to higher-ups, Nick, Kurt and Dale decide to become their own bosses and launch their own business. Soon, though, a slick investor pulls the rug out from under them. Outplayed and desperate, and with no legal recourse, the three would-be entrepreneurs hatch a misguided plan to kidnap the investors adult son and ransom him to regain control of their company.

programme.title: The Boss
programme.desc: Sent to prison for insider trading, a titan of industry emerges ready to rebrand herself as Americas latest sweetheart, but not everyone is so quick to forgive and forget.

programme.title: Police Academy
programme.desc: As a crime wave sweeps the city and the police department suffers a shortage of officers, the mayor decrees that admission to the Police Academy will be open to any and all applicants. Now the first cadets, a collection of oddballs, eccentrics and misfits will soon be let loose on the streets. That is if they somehow manage to graduate in this worldwide hit comedy that started the series of Police Academy films.

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: When he is ruled to be property and not a person, a foul-mouthed teddy bear seeks the aid of a legendary civil rights attorney to gain the justice he deserves.

programme.title: The Hangover Part II
programme.desc: Phil, Stu and their mates travel to Thailand for Stus subdued pre-wedding brunch after the unforgettable bachelor party in Vegas. However, things dont go to plan.

programme.title: The 40 Year Old Virgin
programme.desc: Forty-year-old Andy Stitzer has done quite a few things in his life. Hes got a cushy job stamping invoices at an electronics superstore, a nice apartment with a proud collection of action figures and comic books, good friends, a nice attitude. But theres just one little thing he hasnt quite gotten around to doing yet - something most people have done by his age. Done a lot. Andys never, ever, ever had sex - not even by accident. So is that such a big deal? Well, for Andys buds at the store, it sure is. Although they think hes a bit of an oddball, theres certainly a planet full of stranger (and homelier) guys whove at least had one go at having a go. They consider it their duty to help Andy out of his dire situation and go to great lengths to help him.

programme.title: Old School

They soon become regular guests at Mitchs place.

programme.title: Year One
programme.desc: History was made by these guys? Zed and Oh are cavemen who stumble out of the mountains into an epic journey of biblical proportions. Ones a bumbling hunter, the others a gentle gatherer, together, they become unlikely participants in historys most pivotal moments.

They consider it their duty to help Andy out of his dire situation and go to great lengths to help him.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2
programme.desc: Beca, Fat Amy and the Barden Bellas are back to pitch slap the world! After a scandal threatens to derail their last year at Barden, the three-time defending champs worry that theyve lost their harmony for good. With one chance left at redeeming their legacy, they must they must face off against the toughest competition on the planet: German supergroup Das Sound Machine and fight for their right to win at the World Championships of A Cappella. It will take the power of sisterhood to find their voice and see what it takes to be the worlds top pitches!

programme.title: Hot Rod
programme.desc: Amateur stuntman Rod Kimble has got a problem with his stepfather, Frank Powell, whos a real jerk. Frank picks on Rod, tosses him around like a rag doll in their weekly sparring sessions, and definitely doesnt respect him, much less his stunts - as he says, "you never sneak up on a man whos been in a chemical fire". But when Frank falls ill, its up to Rod to stage the stunt jump of his life in order to raise the money for Franks heart operation and save him.

programme.title: Liar Liar
programme.desc: A fast-talking lawyer and habitual liar discovers that he is unable to tell a lie or withhold the truth about anything for 24 hours after his son makes a birthday wish that comes true.

programme.title: Benchwarmers 2: Breaking Balls
programme.desc: Ben McGrath (Chris Klein) had major league potential playing professional baseball, but his hopes to play ball literally get crushed. Down on his luck, Ben gets another swing at redemption as a new attorney for Schmood and Associates. His unorthodox boss, Mel (Jon Lovitz), convinces him to manage their eclectic softball team full of misfits and strikeouts. Together, will they have enough spirit to rally and win it all?

programme.title: Last Vegas
programme.desc: Billy, Paddy, Archie and Sam have been best friends since childhood. So when Billy, the groups sworn bachelor, finally proposes to his thirty-something (of course) girlfriend, the four head to Las Vegas with a plan to stop acting their age and relive their glory days. However, upon arriving, the four quickly realise that the decades have transformed Sin City and tested their friendship in ways they never imagines. The Rat Pack may have once played the Sands and Cirque du Soleil may now rule the strip, but its these four who are taking over Vegas.

programme.title: Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy
programme.desc: "Im Ron Burgundy, heres whats happening in your world, tonight." Ron Burgundy is a top-rated 1970s San Diego anchorman, who believes women have a place in the newsroom - as long as they stick to covering fashion shows or late-breaking cooking stories. So when Ron is told hell be working with a bright, young newswoman whos beautiful, ambitious and smart enough to be more than eye candy, its not just a clash of two TV people with really great hair - its war.

programme.title: Little Fockers
programme.desc: After 10 years and two little Fockers, Greg returns and is still battling his father-in-laws suspicions. Will Greg pass Jacks final test and become the familys next patriarch?

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2
programme.desc: Beca, Fat Amy and the Barden Bellas are back to pitch slap the world! After a scandal threatens to derail their last year at Barden, the three-time defending champs worry that theyve lost their harmony for good. With one chance left at redeeming their legacy, they must they must face off against the toughest competition on the planet: German supergroup Das Sound Machine and fight for their right to win at the World Championships of A Cappella. programme.title: Liar Liar
programme.desc: A fast-talking lawyer and habitual liar discovers that he is unable to tell a lie or withhold the truth about anything for 24 hours after his son makes a birthday wish that comes true.

programme.title: Wanderlust
programme.desc: After George is downsized from his financial firm and Lindas depressing documentary is cancelled, they can no longer afford their overpriced micro-loft in New York. They find themselves with just one option - to pack up their lives and head south to move in with Georges brother and his wife. George and Linda stumble upon Elysium, an idyllic community where the only rule is to be yourself.

programme.title: Benchwarmers 2: Breaking Balls
programme.desc: Ben McGrath (Chris Klein) had major league potential playing professional baseball, but his hopes to play ball literally get crushed. Down on his luck, Ben gets another swing at redemption as a new attorney for Schmood and Associates. His unorthodox boss, Mel (Jon Lovitz), convinces him to manage their eclectic softball team full of misfits and strikeouts. Together, will they have enough spirit to rally and win it all?

programme.title: Did You Hear About the Morgans?
programme.desc: A delightful comedy about finding love in the most unexpected places. Two successful New Yorkers, Paul and Meryl, are at their wits end with repairing their strained marriage. But when they become the only witnesses to a brutal murder, the police hide them away in Wyoming, together. Now these die-hard city dwellers will have to survive the weather, bears, fresh air, and forced time with one another if they want to make it out alive.

programme.title: White Chicks
programme.desc: What happens when two fumbling FBI agents disguise themselves as mega-rich princesses to infiltrate high society? Snap! Its frantic antics and nonstop hilarity as the brothers go from hapless G-men to haute couture G-strings. Groovin tunes, hardcore jams and a side-splitting disco dance-off with the bluebloods fuel outrageous laughs from start to finish. Two brothers just keepin it real. Sort of.

programme.title: The Mask
programme.desc: Stanely Ipkiss is a mild mannered bank clerk who discovers a mysterious ancient mask which brings his inner most desires screaming to life. Now, together with his sidekick dog, Milo, this wise cracking, love-crazy, crime-fighting green tornado is taking Edge City by storm, in an unstoppable action comedy that will leave you smokin!

programme.title: Bad News Bears
programme.desc: Grizzled former professional baseball player Morris Buttermaker (Billy Bob Thornton) is recruited by a strait-laced lawyer (Marcia Gay Harden) to coach the Bears, a woefully inept Little League team. Hes got to find a way to drive this gang of 12 misfits to a championship against their hated rivals: the Yankees and their overbearing coach (Greg Kinnear). A hilarious homage to an irreverent 1976 comedy, THE BAD NEWS BEARS.

programme.title: Father Figures
programme.desc: Two brothers whose eccentric mother raised them to believe their father had died when they were young, discover this to be a lie. So they set out to find their real father, learning more about their mother than they probably ever wanted to know.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: For four years, the courageous crew of the NSEA Protector set off on thrilling and often dangerous missions in space and then their series was cancelled! Now, twenty years later, aliens under attack have mistaken the Galaxy Quest television transmissions for "historical documents" and beamed up the crew of has-been actors to save the universe. With no script, no director and no clue, the actors must turn in the performances of their lives.

programme.title: Old School
programme.desc: Three men relive their carefree college years by killing off as many brain cells as possible in this over-the-top comedy. Mitch returns home from a less-than-pleasant business trip one evening to discover his wife, Heidi, involved in a menage a trois with two blindfolded strangers. Feeling less than welcome at home after this, Mitch rents a house near the campus of a nearby college; two of Mitchs old college buddies, Beanie and Frank, stop by to cheer him up. They soon become regular guests at Mitchs place.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses 2
programme.desc: Fed up with answering to higher-ups, Nick, Kurt and Dale decide to become their own bosses and launch their own business. Soon, though, a slick investor pulls the rug out from under them. Outplayed and desperate, and with no legal recourse, the three would-be entrepreneurs hatch a misguided plan to kidnap the investors adult son and ransom him to regain control of their company.

programme.title: The Boss
programme.desc: Sent to prison for insider trading, a titan of industry emerges ready to rebrand herself as Americas latest sweetheart, but not everyone is so quick to forgive and forget.

programme.title: Police Academy
programme.desc: As a crime wave sweeps the city and the police department suffers a shortage of officers, the mayor decrees that admission to the Police Academy will be open to any and all applicants. Now the first cadets, a collection of oddballs, eccentrics and misfits will soon be let loose on the streets. That is if they somehow manage to graduate in this worldwide hit comedy that started the series of Police Academy films.

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: When he is ruled to be property and not a person, a foul-mouthed teddy bear seeks the aid of a legendary civil rights attorney to gain the justice he deserves.

programme.title: The Hangover Part II
programme.desc: Phil, Stu and their mates travel to Thailand for Stus subdued pre-wedding brunch after the unforgettable bachelor party in Vegas. However, things dont go to plan.

programme.title: The 40 Year Old Virgin
programme.desc: Forty-year-old Andy Stitzer has done quite a few things in his life. Hes got a cushy job stamping invoices at an electronics superstore, a nice apartment with a proud collection of action figures and comic books, good friends, a nice attitude. But theres just one little thing he hasnt quite gotten around to doing yet - something most people have done by his age. Done a lot. Andys never, ever, ever had sex - not even by accident. So is that such a big deal? Well, for Andys buds at the store, it sure is. Although they think hes a bit of an oddball, theres certainly a planet full of stranger (and homelier) guys whove at least had one go at having a go. They consider it their duty to help Andy out of his dire situation and go to great lengths to help him.

programme.title: Old School

programme.title: Year One
programme.desc: History was made by these guys? Zed and Oh are cavemen who stumble out of the mountains into an epic journey of biblical proportions. Ones a bumbling hunter, the others a gentle gatherer, together, they become unlikely participants in historys most pivotal moments.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2
programme.desc: Beca, Fat Amy and the Barden Bellas are back to pitch slap the world! After a scandal threatens to derail their last year at Barden, the three-time defending champs worry that theyve lost their harmony for good. With one chance left at redeeming their legacy, they must they must face off against the toughest competition on the planet: German supergroup Das Sound Machine and fight for their right to win at the World Championships of A Cappella. It will take the power of sisterhood to find their voice and see what it takes to be the worlds top pitches!

programme.title: Hot Rod
programme.desc: Amateur stuntman Rod Kimble has got a problem with his stepfather, Frank Powell, whos a real jerk. Frank picks on Rod, tosses him around like a rag doll in their weekly sparring sessions, and definitely doesnt respect him, much less his stunts - as he says, "you never sneak up on a man whos been in a chemical fire". But when Frank falls ill, its up to Rod to stage the stunt jump of his life in order to raise the money for Franks heart operation and save him.

programme.title: Liar Liar
programme.desc: A fast-talking lawyer and habitual liar discovers that he is unable to tell a lie or withhold the truth about anything for 24 hours after his son makes a birthday wish that comes true.

programme.title: Benchwarmers 2: Breaking Balls
programme.desc: Ben McGrath (Chris Klein) had major league potential playing professional baseball, but his hopes to play ball literally get crushed. Down on his luck, Ben gets another swing at redemption as a new attorney for Schmood and Associates. His unorthodox boss, Mel (Jon Lovitz), convinces him to manage their eclectic softball team full of misfits and strikeouts. Together, will they have enough spirit to rally and win it all?

programme.title: Last Vegas
programme.desc: Billy, Paddy, Archie and Sam have been best friends since childhood. So when Billy, the groups sworn bachelor, finally proposes to his thirty-something (of course) girlfriend, the four head to Las Vegas with a plan to stop acting their age and relive their glory days. However, upon arriving, the four quickly realise that the decades have transformed Sin City and tested their friendship in ways they never imagines. The Rat Pack may have once played the Sands and Cirque du Soleil may now rule the strip, but its these four who are taking over Vegas.

programme.title: Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy
programme.desc: "Im Ron Burgundy, heres whats happening in your world, tonight." Ron Burgundy is a top-rated 1970s San Diego anchorman, who believes women have a place in the newsroom - as long as they stick to covering fashion shows or late-breaking cooking stories. So when Ron is told hell be working with a bright, young newswoman whos beautiful, ambitious and smart enough to be more than eye candy, its not just a clash of two TV people with really great hair - its war.

programme.title: Little Fockers
programme.desc: After 10 years and two little Fockers, Greg returns and is still battling his father-in-laws suspicions. Will Greg pass Jacks final test and become the familys next patriarch?

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2
programme.desc: Beca, Fat Amy and the Barden Bellas are back to pitch slap the world! After a scandal threatens to derail their last year at Barden, the three-time defending champs worry that theyve lost their harmony for good. programme.title: Liar Liar
programme.desc: A fast-talking lawyer and habitual liar discovers that he is unable to tell a lie or withhold the truth about anything for 24 hours after his son makes a birthday wish that comes true.

programme.title: Wanderlust
programme.desc: After George is downsized from his financial firm and Lindas depressing documentary is cancelled, they can no longer afford their overpriced micro-loft in New York. They find themselves with just one option - to pack up their lives and head south to move in with Georges brother and his wife. George and Linda stumble upon Elysium, an idyllic community where the only rule is to be yourself.

programme.title: Benchwarmers 2: Breaking Balls
programme.desc: Ben McGrath (Chris Klein) had major league potential playing professional baseball, but his hopes to play ball literally get crushed. programme.title: Did You Hear About the Morgans?
programme.desc: A delightful comedy about finding love in the most unexpected places. Two successful New Yorkers, Paul and Meryl, are at their wits end with repairing their strained marriage. But when they become the only witnesses to a brutal murder, the police hide them away in Wyoming, together. Now these die-hard city dwellers will have to survive the weather, bears, fresh air, and forced time with one another if they want to make it out alive.

programme.title: White Chicks
programme.desc: What happens when two fumbling FBI agents disguise themselves as mega-rich princesses to infiltrate high society? Snap! Its frantic antics and nonstop hilarity as the brothers go from hapless G-men to haute couture G-strings. Groovin tunes, hardcore jams and a side-splitting disco dance-off with the bluebloods fuel outrageous laughs from start to finish. Two brothers just keepin it real. Sort of.

programme.title: The Mask
programme.desc: Stanely Ipkiss is a mild mannered bank clerk who discovers a mysterious ancient mask which brings his inner most desires screaming to life. Now, together with his sidekick dog, Milo, this wise cracking, love-crazy, crime-fighting green tornado is taking Edge City by storm, in an unstoppable action comedy that will leave you smokin!

programme.title: Bad News Bears
programme.desc: Grizzled former professional baseball player Morris Buttermaker (Billy Bob Thornton) is recruited by a strait-laced lawyer (Marcia Gay Harden) to coach the Bears, a woefully inept Little League team. Hes got to find a way to drive this gang of 12 misfits to a championship against their hated rivals: the Yankees and their overbearing coach (Greg Kinnear). A hilarious homage to an irreverent 1976 comedy, THE BAD NEWS BEARS.

programme.title: Father Figures
programme.desc: Two brothers whose eccentric mother raised them to believe their father had died when they were young, discover this to be a lie. So they set out to find their real father, learning more about their mother than they probably ever wanted to know.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: Feelings develop between Rush and FBI agent Ryan Cavanaugh as they work on the unsolved case of a US soldier murdered at Woodstock between tours in Vietnam.

programme.title: Soul Power
programme.desc: A filmed account of the Zaire 74 soul music festival, originally intended to be in concert with the famous Rumble in the Jungle bout in Kinshasa, Zaire in 1974.

programme.title: Searching for Sugar Man
programme.desc: SEARCHING FOR SUGAR MAN tells the incredible true story of Rodriguez, the greatest 70s rock icon who never was. Discovered in a Detroit bar in the late 60s by two celebrated producers struck by his soulful melodies and prophetic lyrics, they recorded an album which they believed would secure his reputation as the greatest recording artist of his generation. In fact, the album bombed and the singer disappeared into obscurity amid rumours of a gruesome on-stage suicide. But a bootleg recording found its way into apartheid South Africa and, over the next two decades, he became a phenomenon. The film follows the story of two South African fans who set out to find out what really happened to their hero. Their investigation leads them to a story more extraordinary than any of the existing myths about the artist known as Rodriguez.

programme.title: Assassins
programme.desc: The audacious murder of the brother of North Koreas Supreme Leader Kim Jong-un in a crowded Malaysian airport sparked a worldwide media frenzy. At the centre of the investigation are two young women who are either cold-blooded killers or unwitting pawns in a political assassination. "Assassins" goes beyond the headlines to question every angle of this case, from human trafficking to geo-political espionage to the secretive dynamics of the North Korean dynasty.

programme.title: Railway Murders
programme.desc: 37-year-old Detective Sergeant Robert Kidd was murdered in Sepember 1895, while investigating a spate of thefts from goods wagons.

programme.title: Railway Murders
programme.desc: The murder on 18th March 1910 of John Innes Nisbet, a colliery clerk from Heaton who had been carrying miners pay for Stobswood Colliery. John Alexander Dickman was hanged for the crime.

programme.title: Bra Boys
programme.desc: This is a documentary about the cultural evolution of the inner-Sydney beachside suburb of Maroubra and the social struggle of its youth - the tattooed and much maligned surf tribe known as the Bra Boys. It is the first full-length feature film project that is told through the eyes of the members of the Bra Boys. It is their story. It shows their success in professional big wave surfing, it explores their international reputation for hard partying and rough justice, it touches on their running battle with authorities and it shows their absolute reliance on one another to fit into a society in which they are displaced and, at times, disinterested. Narrated by Australian actor Russell Crowe, this film looks at the evolution of the suburb of Maroubra, coupled with the historical stigma associated with Australias rebellious surf community. Central to the story is the true-life struggle of the Abberton brothers - Sunny, Koby, Jai and Dakota - one charged with murdering a Sydney standover man, another pursuing a professional surf career but charged as an accessory in his brothers legal fight, another trying to hold the family together and a young brother whose inheritance is his siblings notoriety. The film uses rare archival footage blended with incredible surf vision and intimate interviews to create a story that is both compassionate and exhilarating. Being a Bra Boy is about holding your ground - about brotherhood, honour, loyalty and family, in all its forms. The film is a story of contrast involving against-the-odds success and probable failures and, ultimately, explores the legacy and hopes of this and the next generation of a uniquely Australian community.

programme.title: Once Upon A Time... In Hollywood
programme.desc: The highly anticipated 9th film from Quentin Tarantino. In 1969 Los Angeles, during the Charles Manson murders, a TV actor and his stunt double, embark on an odyssey to make a name for themselves in the film industry.

programme.title: About Schmidt
programme.desc: Warren Schmidt is about to taste a not so sweet slice of life. When he retired, he and his wife Helen had big plans, but an unexpected twist changed everything. Now, all of Schmidts attention is focused his daughters upcoming wedding to a loser waterbed salesman. From meeting hippie parents to sponsoring a Tanzanian foster child, Schmidt embarks on a search for answers and discovers that life is full of trick questions.

programme.title: Apollo 13
programme.desc: Stranded 205,000 miles from Earth in a crippled spacecraft, astronauts Jim Lovell, Fred Haise and Jack Swigert fight a desperate battle to survive. Meanwhile, at Mission Control, astronaut Ken Mattingly, flight director Gene Kranz and a heroic ground crew race against time - and the odds - to bring them home.

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: Kevin has evidenced 23 personalities to his trusted psychiatrist, Dr Fletcher, but there remains one still submerged who is set to materialise and dominate all the others. Compelled to abduct three teenage girls, led by the wilful, observant Casey, Kevin reaches a war for survival among all of those contained within him, as well as everyone around him, as the walls between his compartments shatter apart.

programme.title: Dunkirk
programme.desc: In May 1940, Germany advance into France, trapping Allied troops on the beaches of Dunkirk. In a heroic mission, British and French forces evacuate thousands of soldiers.

programme.title: Sleepers
programme.desc: In a tale of innocence lost and vengeance unleashed, four men plot retribution over their mistreatment in a violent reform school as boys.

Now, all of Schmidts attention is focused his daughters upcoming wedding to a loser waterbed salesman. From meeting hippie parents to sponsoring a Tanzanian foster child, Schmidt embarks on a search for answers and discovers that life is full of trick questions.

programme.title: Apollo 13
programme.desc: Stranded 205,000 miles from Earth in a crippled spacecraft, astronauts Jim Lovell, Fred Haise and Jack Swigert fight a desperate battle to survive. Meanwhile, at Mission Control, astronaut Ken Mattingly, flight director Gene Kranz and a heroic ground crew race against time - and the odds - to bring them home.

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: Kevin has evidenced 23 personalities to his trusted psychiatrist, Dr Fletcher, but there remains one still submerged who is set to materialise and dominate all the others. Compelled to abduct three teenage girls, led by the wilful, observant Casey, Kevin reaches a war for survival among all of those contained within him, as well as everyone around him, as the walls between his compartments shatter apart.

programme.title: Dunkirk
programme.desc: In May 1940, Germany advance into France, trapping Allied troops on the beaches of Dunkirk. In a heroic mission, British and French forces evacuate thousands of soldiers.

programme.title: Sleepers
programme.desc: In a tale of innocence lost and vengeance unleashed, four men plot retribution over their mistreatment in a violent reform school as boys.

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: A Harvard professor implicated in a murder must unravel an ancient code to expose the greatest conspiracy in history.

programme.title: Ordinary Angels
programme.desc: A struggling hairdresser finds a renewed sense of purpose when she meets a widowed father and his two daughters.

programme.title: Being John Malkovich
programme.desc: Three best friends attempt to escape their suburban boredom through a life of crime. But these bickering, bumbling thieves are no match for the local godfather who leads them into the biggest heist of their careers.

programme.title: Sound of Metal
programme.desc: When ex-addict Ruben unexpectedly loses his hearing while touring with his girlfriend Lou, he becomes overwhelmed by anxiety and his life is thrown into turmoil. In a group home for Deaf addicts, Ruben must choose between his new Deaf community and the life of sound he left behind.

programme.title: Rocketman
programme.desc: An epic musical story about Elton Johns breakthrough years. The film follows the fantastical journey of transformation from shy piano prodigy Reginald Dwight into international superstar Elton John. This inspirational movie tells the universally relatable story of how a small-town boy became one of the most iconic figures in pop culture.

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: The continuing story of the Crawley family.

programme.title: Out of Sight
programme.desc: Meet Jack Foley, the most successful bank robber in the country. On the day he busts out of jail, he finds himself stealing something far more precious than money Karen Siscos heart. Shes smart. Shes sexy. And unfortunately for Jack, shes a Federal Marshall. Now, theyre willing to risk it all to find out if theres more between them than just the law.

programme.title: The Bourne Legacy
programme.desc: On the verge of having their conspiracy exposed, members of the governments intelligence community will stop at nothing to erase all evidence of their top secret programs - even the agents involved. Aaron Cross must use his genetically-engineered skills to survive the ultimate game of cat-and-mouse and finish what Jason Bourne started.

programme.desc: The highly anticipated 9th film from Quentin Tarantino. In 1969 Los Angeles, during the Charles Manson murders, a TV actor and his stunt double, embark on an odyssey to make a name for themselves in the film industry.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws of Destiny
programme.desc: Po and the Kids are put to the ultimate test, and must use all their knowledge and skills in order to defeat The White Bone Demon.

programme.title: Abominable and the Invisible City
programme.desc: While Yi and the crew try to pinpoint how Yis magic works, they notice that Everest isnt looking too hot. In fact, hes too hot. The crew tries everything to cool him down, even begging their old foe, Burnish, for help. Out of options, Yi tries to use her magic to send Everest home - until Burnish and his jerboa sidekick, Duchess, reveal that theyve made over the kids rooftop fort into a high-tech HQ, complete with various tech gadgets for the crew and a temperature-controlled chamber for Everest.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business
programme.desc: Boss thought that breaking his arm was painful;but the true pain starts at pediatrician Dr. Kevins "jokes." Boss enlists the playgroup babies to defang the doctor of his "comedians disease." Tim obsesses about keeping his little brother safe.

programme.title: The Croods: Family Tree
programme.desc: Ugga has a secret - shes taking Eep to "flop with the bulrusses" - a fun and dangerous pastime Ugga enjoyed as a teen. Uggas excitement fades when Hope invites herself and Dawn along.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.sub-title: Captain Underpants and the Savage Spite of the Slimy Salamangler
programme.desc: Krupps campers take on rich rivals in a hoity-toity boat race that also features a revenge-obsessed giant salamander. Paging Captain Underpants!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents-her mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Dragons: The Nine Realms
programme.desc: Tom and the riders go in search of Thunder and must face a gauntlet of dangerous dragons to find their lost friend. Along the way, Tom reveals his big secret to DAngelo and Alex.

programme.title: Fast and Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: Despite the Spy Racers best efforts, Dann is able to set off one of her earthquake devices causing all of L.A. to shake. Now its a race against the clock as they embark on their final mission to stop Dann and her super-soldiers for good!

programme.title: Jurassic World: Camp Cretaceous
programme.desc: The kids must get to the boat and escape the island. Butwhen Ben disappears, deciding he needs to stay on the island, Darius takes it upon himself to convince him to go with them.

programme.title: Jurassic World: Camp Cretaceous
programme.desc: After a horrifying discovery, Darius will have to put his love of all dinosaurs to the side and make a tough decision.

programme.desc: The Templetons hometown is overtaken by baby criminals, with Temp Baby Aubrey in charge. With Tina now acting like a dark angel of vengeance after feeling betrayed by Aubrey, Boss is forced to assemble a team from unlikely odd friends. Together, they launch a final mission to settle old scores and clear Boss Babys name.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business
programme.desc: The worlds worst baby is on the loose and Boss Baby, Tim and the team must find him before he turns the whole neighborhood against babies.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business
programme.desc: When an unexpected kitten shows up on Boss Babys doorstep, they go head to head against the feline enemy.

programme.title: Jurassic World: Camp Cretaceous
programme.desc: The kids narrowly make it to the monorail and what appears to be their ticket out of a less than ideal situation. As they ride toward their escape, they come to discover through the power of using their words that they are more alike than they are different. But when Pteranodons attack the monorail, Ben makes an uncharacteristically heroic choice.

programme.title: Jurassic World: Camp Cretaceous
programme.desc: The kids are shocked by Bens death (note: he will return in S2), but dont have time to grieve. They disappear into the tunnels, hoping to make it to the last ferry before it leaves.
