programme.title: The Adventures of Rocky and Bullwinkle
programme.desc: When Fearless Leader uses the monster Humongalon to force everyone to surrender the world to him, Rocky and Bullwinkle try to stop them in the most massive monster battle ever.

programme.title: The Adventures of Rocky and Bullwinkle
programme.desc: When Rocky and Bullwinkle damage the largest birdbath in the world, they set out on a musical adventure to put on a benefit concert and raise the money needed to restore the birdbath.

programme.title: DreamWorks Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: With Snotlouts fate unclear, Gustav tries to fill in for him at the Dragon Academy.

programme.title: Dawn of the Croods
programme.desc: Sandy becomes jealous when the family gets an adorable monkhuahua/Eep and Thunk act like lazy "slaks" instead of doing their schoolwork and chores.

programme.title: Madagascar: A Little Wild
programme.desc: When Bill the Flamingo moves into the guest habitat, the nosy new neighbor discovers our gang sneaking out for Alexs big catnip commercial audition and insists on joining their adventure. But when Bill has so much fun in the city that he refuses to go home, Alexs audition is threatened, and hes certain they shouldve never let Bill join in their fun. Ultimately, Bill goes out of his way to help Alex prepare for the audition, and Alex learns to give new friends (and even frenemies) a chance.

programme.title: Madagascar: A Little Wild
programme.desc: To prove to his Ma that hes responsible enough to move into a nest of his own, Antney sets out to safely return a lost egg. But after the egg hatches before Anyney returns it- and the alligator inside mistakes Antney for his parent- Antney must find the best home for his newest responsibility, and ultimately learns that sometimes being responsible means making tough decisions and thinking on your feet (or claws!).

programme.title: Dew Drop Diaries
programme.sub-title: The Cleat without Feet Real Magic
programme.desc: When Phoebe accidentally knocks Harpers soccer cleat off the balcony before the big game, the Dew Drops must venture into the city to retrieve the cleat. When Dylan starts practicing magic tricks, Athena thinks his magic is real! But when the Dew Drops investigate his "magic hat," they accidentally break it and must fix it before Dylans magic show for the neighborhood kids.

programme.title: Gabbys Dollhouse
programme.desc: Gabby receives a jar of googly eyes in her Dollhouse Delivery that comes with a warning: "Dont shake the jar of googly eyes or youll be in for a troublemaking surprise." And when CatRat accidentally shakes the jar, it turns several inanimate objects into troublemakers. Gabby and Pandy must find the troublemakers to save the day!

programme.title: Doug Unplugs
programme.sub-title: A Whole Bot of Fun/Volunteer Bot
programme.desc: After Doug and his new friend Emma lose the table tennis ball that he brought from Re-Bots, they go all over Mega City trying to track it down so they can have some fun./The Mega City Library needs volunteers to help get it ready to open, so Doug and Emma try to find their own way to make a difference.

programme.title: Gabbys Dollhouse
programme.desc: Theres a dino in the dollhouse! Gabby unboxes a tiny, spongey capsule that grows into a big, spongey dinosaur when she puts it in the Garden pond. Spongey-Saurus loves being a big dino, but everytime he starts to dry out, he starts to shrink, so all the Gabby Cats try different ways to keep him big. For our Cat of the Day, DJ Catnip and Spongey-Saurus sing a song!

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp is swept by an ocean current to the shore of Unicorn Land where he sees a majestic creature on a cliff that looks just like him, but not like his Narwhal family under the sea. Kelp tells his family hes a unicorn. Kelp returns to Unicorn Land where he meets Pixie and Juniper, who show him around and introduce him to unicorn spark and magic.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.sub-title: Welcome to Pawston Ruff Day on the Job
programme.desc: Tag wants to bring her new neighbor, Scooch, to the Party in the Tree. But a series of traffic jams make Tag impatient, and she keeps trying to find different ways to get to the party. Thanks to Tags handiness - and one of Lady Lydias hats - they make it to the party just in time. Pawstons new canine mail carrier keeps getting chased by dogs, so Tag and Scooch have to help him deliver the mail.

programme.title: Madagascar: A Little Wild
programme.desc: Gloria becomes determined to earn her Queen of Kindness Kidizen badge and welcomes some free-spirited rats who need a place to stay into the habitat. Despite her discomfort, Gloria encourages the rats to make themselves at home. When the rats play with her special baby tusk at the bottom of her tank, she finally snaps and sends the rats home. It isnt until the gang winds up at the rats nest and Gloria almost takes a slice of the rats special cheese that she learns its okay to say no.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws of Destiny
programme.desc: After absorbing the mystical Hero Chi of the Four Constellations, four panda kids enlist the Dragon Master to teach them Kung Fu.

programme.title: Abominable and the Invisible City
programme.sub-title: Sewer Koi and the Museum Heist
programme.desc: An earth-shaking rumble signals the arrival of a new creature, but Yi and Jin butt heads, each convinced theyre the better team leader. The crew eventually discovers that the massive Sewer Koi is behind the earthquakes, but hes missing his precious pearl, the key to a magical underground dam. Without it, the sewers water levels will rise, threatening to overflow and flood the whole city! Its going to take a heist to extract the pearl from its display at a local museum, before its too late.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business
programme.desc: Boss has an opportunity to get his old job back at Baby Corp;but to get the interview;hell need the playgroup babies to help him escape Marsha Krinkles super-safe Bubbeezee playroom. Tim nearly misses Kabob Day at school.

programme.title: The Croods: Family Tree
programme.desc: Bored of the viewing options on window, Thunk realizes what hes been missing - real life drama! But when Thunk starts creating drama around the farm, the others set out to teach him a lesson.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.sub-title: Captain Underpants and the Cunning Combat of the Covert Camoflush
programme.desc: The campers splat-tastic game of paintball is rather rudely interrupted by a foul and formidable fiend known only as Camoflush.

programme.title: Jurassic World: Camp Cretaceous
programme.desc: Now that theyve fled the Main Park and found a place in the jungle to settle down, the kids next task is to find supplies. There, Darius and Sammy face an ethical dilemma: release the still-caged predators into the wild, or let them starve.

programme.title: Jurassic World: Camp Cretaceous
programme.desc: When the campers water supply slows to a trickle, Kenji and Darius head into the jungle to inverstigate. There, they discover a magnificent watering hole where predators and prey peacefully co-exist. Meanwhile, Brooklynn, Sammy, and Yaz go on an investigative journey of their own and find themselves at Wus Genetics Lab, trapped by a trio of Baryonyxes.

programme.title: Jurassic World: Camp Cretaceous
programme.desc: After they realize other people have arrived on Isla Nublar, the campers are thrilled at the prospect of rescue. Darius and Brooklynn end up at odds; Darius connects with the dino-loving couple of eco-tourists, Mitch and Tiff, while Brooklynn distrusts their guide, Hap. Things come to a head, Brooklynn and Kenji flee the guide into the jungle and run into an old friend.

programme.title: Fast and Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: The Spy Racers learn from Ms. Nowhere about Incineration Day, an agency "holiday" where spy tech is destroyed in a fun, safe, stress-relieving explosion. But when a mysterious figure steals the warehouse full of to be destroyed spy tech, the team heads to Europe to embark on their most dangerous mission yet.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents-her mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Dragons: The Nine Realms
programme.desc: Tom and the riders help Thunder, who is seeking revenge against the dragons that chased off his family.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business
programme.desc: The Templetons head to a new family restaurant only to run into Bootsy Calico!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business
programme.sub-title: Formula for Menace: A Dekker Moonboots Mystery
programme.desc: When Baby Corp babies start aging, panic hits the office and the babies set out to find out if someone has been tainting the formula.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business
programme.desc: The annual baby pageant approaches, but Stacis plan to win may have a negative effect.

programme.title: Jurassic World: Camp Cretaceous
programme.desc: Now that theyve fled the Main Park and found a place in the jungle to settle down, the kids next task is to find supplies. Kenji offers to stay behind with a still injured Yaz, while Darius, Brooklynn, and Sammy set off to a nearby vet station. There, Darius and Sammy face an ethical dilemma: release the still-caged predators into the wild, or let them starve.

programme.title: Jurassic World: Camp Cretaceous
programme.desc: When the campers water supply slows to a trickle, Kenji and Darius head into the jungle to inverstigate. There, they discover a magnificent watering hole where predators and prey peacefully co-exist. Meanwhile, Brooklynn, Sammy, and Yaz go on an investigative journey of their own and find themselves at Wus Genetics Lab, trapped by a trio of Baryonyxes.

programme.title: Jurassic World: Camp Cretaceous
programme.desc: After they realize other people have arrived on Isla Nublar, the campers are thrilled at the prospect of rescue. Darius and Brooklynn end up at odds; Darius connects with the dino-loving couple of eco-tourists, Mitch and Tiff, while Brooklynn distrusts their guide, Hap. Things come to a head, Brooklynn and Kenji flee the guide into the jungle and run into an old friend.

programme.title: The Adventures of Rocky and Bullwinkle
programme.desc: A video of Rocky and Bullwinkle playing a song goes viral and theyre rocketed to musical superstardom. They decide to use their newfound celebrity to launch a "save the birdbath" concert tour to restore the giant birdbath they destroyed.

programme.title: The Adventures of Rocky and Bullwinkle
programme.desc: Rocky, Bullwinkle, Boris and Natasha are kidnapped by a super-fan named Francis, the eight-year-old heir to the Puffy Platypus Pizza franchise, to play a private concert for his birthday.

programme.title: DreamWorks Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: Hiccup, Toothless, and the dragon riders discover an injured Scauldron on the shores of Changewing Island. When the Scauldron takes a shine to Ruffnut, the kids see a chance to heal the dragon and return him safely to the ocean, before he falls victim to the elements, as well as the territorial Changewings.

programme.title: Dawn of the Croods
programme.desc: Eep has the first pen pal in Gulp Gorge/Gran sends Ugga and Eep on the first treasure hunt when she decides to pass on her inheritance.

programme.title: Madagascar: A Little Wild
programme.desc: When Ranger Hoof invites Marty to Junior Ranger Horse training, Marty insists on playing by the book- the ranger rulebook. After an argument with a carefree filly gets them both kicked out of the program, Marty learns to trust his animal instincts- and his fellow foals.

programme.title: Madagascar: A Little Wild
programme.desc: During an animal painting exhibition at the NYC Art Museum, Melman (whose crayon-artworks at the Habitat is legendary) worries that his classic-cute style isnt up to snuff. When he copies a notable painting and passes it off as his own, Melman becomes an art star, only to discover that nothing beats a Melman original.

programme.title: Dew Drop Diaries
programme.sub-title: The Sleepover Save The Very Hungry Vacuum
programme.desc: Marcus is having his first sleepover and Phoebe is concerned that Marcus may be nervous so Phoebe sets out to make sure he has the best first sleepover ever. When Athenas magical jump rope gets sucked up by the familys new robot vacuum, she loses confidence in her abilities, only to learn that her real abilities are already inside her.

programme.title: Gabbys Dollhouse
programme.desc: Gabbys dollhouse delivery is a painting of the Gabby Cats, which looks like it belongs in an art museum. Gabby and Pandy help the Gabby Cats create unique pieces of artwork in preparation for Baby Boxs highly anticipated Meow-seum Day in the dollhouse. Let the art-venture begin!

programme.title: Doug Unplugs
programme.sub-title: Bot on the Beach/Bot of the Party
programme.desc: After Doug plugs in to learn what a beach is, Emma takes him for a fun day of activities to teach him why people love going to the beach./Jenny Droneberg has just made her 1000th delivery, so Emma has to teach the robots how to really celebrate - with a party! But when all of their party supplies go missing, she and Doug have to figure out what happened to them.

programme.title: Gabbys Dollhouse
programme.desc: Gabby unboxes an attachment that turns Carlita into an Ice Cream Truck! The only problem is...theres no ice cream! The Gabby Cats all help out to make ice cream, a menu, and a groovy ice-cream truck song! For our COTD, Baby Box shows us how to make our very own miniature ice cream truck!

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: When Kelp is introduced to crunchy tacos in Unicorn Land, he must use his bubble sparks to bring them back to his family underwater. Kelps unicorn friends are going to teach him Swishbee on land. But it rains and the game is called off until Kelp shows them that playing in the water can be even more fun.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.sub-title: Dark Park Bark Lark The Fast and the Curious
programme.desc: Tag and Scooch team up to get all of Scoochs chores done in time for the Barkapellas Bark In the Park In the Dark concert. Tag is so excited to join the Sam Whippets Race Cadets. But when Tag and Scooch show up at the racetrack, theres lots of competition. And to complete the first challenge - a pedal car race - theyre going to have to work together.

programme.title: Madagascar: A Little Wild
programme.desc: When Alex realizes hes too small to climb onto his new habitat "stage", he feels too small for his dreams- until he hears of a big, new roller coaster at Coney Island and figures if he can ride the big coaster, thatll prove that hes a BIG deal! But when Alex is too short to be allowed on the ride- and his friends find themselves stuck at the top of it- Alex saves the day when he realizes that there are advantages to being small, and learns that his body is perfect just the way it is.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws of Destiny
programme.desc: When the kids grow over-confident after beginning their training, they decide to intercept a distress call and sneak off without permission, only to land themselves in hot water.

programme.title: Abominable and the Invisible City
programme.desc: With the sudden closing of a local candy shop, NaiNai is busy trying to recreate its famous candied fruit. But after a late-night sugar binge in NaiNais stash, Peng starts acting strangely. It turns out that hes possessed by magical creatures! The Minticon are sugar-addicted puffball creatures, who previously lived in the old candy shop. Armed with her violin, Yi commands the creatures out of Pengs body, winning over the Minticon in the process.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business
programme.desc: Boss comes face to face with his old nemesis;Bug The Pug;after the playgroup parents decide to throw a Puppy Party. Staci creates a "No-Paperworkist" movement to avoid Buddy From HRs constant paperwork.

programme.title: The Croods: Family Tree
programme.desc: Sandy is finally old enough to join Grug and Eep for the annual Daddy Daughter Day and Grug couldnt be more excited. But when Sandy struggles to fit in with Grug and Eeps traditions, Grug has second thoughts. It isnt until Sandy goes missing that Grug realizes its time to start a new tradition.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.sub-title: Captain Underpants and the Bad Beat of the Blah Borelock
programme.desc: With fun in short supply, Harold and George persuade Krupp to dump the campers in the middle of the forest so they can learn to rough it.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! programme.title: Dragons: The Nine Realms
programme.desc: Moving to an exotic new home, an adventurous teenager meets a new group of kids and discovers a dragon in the fissure.

programme.desc: The team uncovers the person behind the Incineration Day theft: General Dudley! While tracking him down, theyre led into an ambush in the Swiss Alps. Is the general just a pawn in a larger plan?

programme.title: Jurassic World: Camp Cretaceous
programme.desc: The kids have finally made it out to sea but they soon discover that the waters might not be as free from dinosaurs as they had anticipated.

programme.title: Jurassic World: Camp Cretaceous
programme.desc: Having discovered themselves on a new mysterious island, the kids must keep their energy and attitudes up while trying to figure out where theyve landed.

programme.title: Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron
programme.desc: A tale which follows the adventures of a wild and rambunctious mustang stallion as he journeys through the untamed American frontiers, encountering man for the first time, Spirit defies being broken, even as he develops a remarkable friendship with a young Lakota brave named Little Creek. The young stallion also finds love with a beautiful paint mare named Rain on his way to becoming one of the greatest unsung heroes of the Old West.

programme.title: Tad The Lost Explorer
programme.desc: Due to a fortuitous mix-up, Tad, a dreamy construction worker, is mistaken for a famous archaeologist and sent on an expedition to Peru. With the help of Jeff, his faithful dog, an intrepid teacher, a mute parrot and a hustler, they will try to save the mythical Lost City of the Incas from an evil band of treasure hunters.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 2
programme.desc: Po is now living his dream as The Dragon Warrior. But his new life is threatened by the emergence of a formidable villain, who plans to use a secret weapon to conquer China.

programme.title: Over the Hedge
programme.desc: Spring has sprung, and Verne and his woodland friends awaken from their long winters nap to discover that a large, green hedge has cropped up right through the middle of their once-natural habitat. Enter RJ, an opportunistic raccoon who explains that the world beyond the hedge is the gateway to the good life where peculiar creatures called humans live to eat, rather than eat to live. "For humans," RJ proclaims, "enough is never enough."

programme.title: Chicken Run
programme.desc: While the chickens on evil Mrs Tweedys farm dream of a better life, a clever hen named Ginger is hatching plans to fly the coop for good. The only problem is, chickens cant fly or can they? Every escape attempt goes fowl until Rocky, a smooth-talking All-American rooster, crash-lands into the coop. Its hardly poultry in motion when Rocky attempts to teach Ginger and her fine feathered friends to fly but, with teamwork, determination and a little bit of cluck, the fearless flock plots one last daring attempt in a spectacular bid for freedom! Featuring unforgettable characters, incredible animation and all-star voice talent, this instant classic from the academy Award-winning creators of Wallace and Gromit is eggs-traordinary fun for the whole family!

programme.title: Migration
programme.desc: The Mallard family embark on a journey south for the winter to Jamaica via New York City, only for their well-laid plans to go awry, leading to new friends and unknown horizons.

programme.title: Balto
programme.desc: Part husky, part wolf, Balto doesnt know where he belongs. Hes an outcast in Alaska, except to his true friends - Boris, the Russian snow goose, polar bear cubs Muk and Luk, and the beautiful husky, Jenna. Even though hes different, all of Baltos friends recognise what he still cant see himself: his noble spirit. One day, a serious diphtheria epidemic spreads fast among the children of Nome. When a fierce blizzard closes off all routes of transport, theres no way to obtain lifesaving medicine - unless a team of sled dogs can race 965km through the blinding Arctic storm and bring back anti-toxin. But when the dogs get lost in the frozen wilderness, only Balto can rescue the team and save the children.

programme.title: Journey 2: The Mysterious Island
programme.desc: The journey begins when young adventurer Sean receives a coded distress signal from a mysterious island where no island should exist - a place of strange life forms, mountains of gold, deadly volcanoes, and more than one astonishing secret. Unable to stop him from going, Seans new stepfather joins the quest. Together with a helicopter pilot and his beautiful, strong-willed daughter, they set out to find the island, rescue its lone inhabitant and escape before seismic shock waves force the island under the sea and bury its treasures forever.

programme.title: Trolls Band Together
programme.desc: Join Poppy and Branch on their latest adventure as they embark on an epic journey that lead to Branchs reunion with his BroZone brothers, and Poppys long-lost sister, Viva.

programme.title: Grand-Daddy Day Care
programme.desc: When Frank Collins (Reno Wilson) suffers from writers block, he decides to start a day care for his father-in-law (Danny Trejo) and other seniors as a way to make quick cash, while giving him time to still work on his next book. Eventually getting a small group to care for, Frank soon learns that these are not your typical seniors and they cant easily be corralled. With a code enforcement officer challenging the legality of his business, and his senior charges getting into all kinds of trouble, Franks work days become anything but effortless. Featuring an all-star cast of TVs greatest stars, Grand-Daddy Day Care is a hilarious story for the young, and young at heart.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit 2: The Runaway
programme.desc: Adventuring out of the garden, Peter finds himself in a world where his mischief is appreciated. When his family risks everything to come find him, he must figure out what kind of bunny he wants to be.

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie
programme.desc: In this hilarious animated adventure comedy, youll finally find out why the birds are so angry. In an island paradise populated entirely by happy, flightless birds - or almost entirely, Red, a bird with a temper problem, speedy Chuck, and the volatile Bomb have always been outsiders. But when the island is visited by mysterious green piggies, its up to these unlikely outcasts to figure out what the pigs are up to.

programme.title: Nanny McPhee
programme.desc: Move over, Mary Poppins. Nanny McPhee is a wonderfully hideous, mysterious nanny hired to tame seven brats with a feckless father.

programme.title: Shark Tale
programme.desc: Oscar is a fast-talking little fish whose big dreams have a habit of landing him in hot water. Lenny is a great white shark with a sensitive side and a secret: hes a vegetarian.

programme.title: Abominable
programme.desc: When teenage Yi encounters a young Yeti on the roof of her apartment building in a modern Chinese city, she and her mischievous friends, Jin and Peng, name him Everest and embark on an epic quest to reunite the magical creature with his family at the highest point on Earth. But the trio of friends will have to stay one-step ahead of Burnish, a wealthy man intent on capturing a Yeti, and zoologist Dr. Zara to help Everest get home.

programme.title: Fred Claus
programme.desc: This is a story youve never heard before, a hilarious and heart warming comedy about Fred Claus, Santas brother - and complete opposite. After growing up in saintly Nicks shadow, Fred becomes a grouch whos lost his belief in Christmas. Then, one magical December, Fred flies north (first class via reindeer) to find brother Nick is in trouble: a scheming efficiency expert is out to shut down Christmas forever! Expect fun by the sleighful as Fred helps save Christmas and rediscovers the gift of family.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
programme.desc: Brooklyn teen Miles Morales is introduced to the limitless possibilities of the Spider-Verse, where more than one can wear the mask.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 3
programme.desc: When Pos long-lost panda father suddenly reappears, the reunited duo travels to a secret panda paradise to meet scores of hilarious new panda characters. When the supernatural villain Kai begins to sweep across China defeating all the kung fu masters, Po must do the impossible: learn to train a village full of his fun-loving, clumsy brethren to become the ultimate band of kung fu pandas.

programme.title: Jumanji: The Next Level
programme.desc: The gang is back but the game has changed. They discover that nothing is as they expect, as they try to escape the worlds most dangerous game.

programme.title: Scoob!
programme.desc: "Scoob!" reveals how lifelong friends Scooby and Shaggy first met and how they joined with young detectives Fred, Velma and Daphne to form the famous Mystery Inc. Now, with hundreds of cases solved and adventures shared, Scooby and the gang face their biggest, most challenging mystery ever, a plot to unleash the ghost dog Cerberus upon the world. As they race to stop this global "dogpocalypse", the gang discovers that Scooby has a secret legacy and an epic destiny greater than anyone imagined.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: As kids in the 1980s, Sam Brenner, Will Cooper, Ludlow Lamonsoff, and Eddie The Fire Blaster Plant saved the world thousands of times - at 25 cents a game in the video arcades. Now, theyre going to have to do it for real. When intergalactic aliens discover video feeds of classic arcade games and misinterpret them as a declaration of war, they attack the Earth, using the video games as the models for their assaults, and now, US President Cooper must call on his old-school arcade friends to save the world from being destroyed by PAC-MAN, Donkey Kong, Galaga, Centipede, and Space Invaders. Joining them is Lt Col Violet Van Patten, a specialist supplying the arcaders with unique weapons to fight the aliens.

programme.title: Aquaman
programme.desc: Half-human, half-Atlantean Arthur Curry goes on a journey that will not only force him to face who he really is, but to discover if he is worthy of who he was born to be, a king.

programme.title: Despicable Me 4
programme.desc: Gru welcomes a new member to the family, Gru Jr, whos intent on tormenting his dad. However, their peaceful existence soon comes crashing down, when criminal mastermind Maxime Le Mal escapes from prison.

programme.title: Matilda
programme.desc: A wonderful little girl who happens to be a genius, along with her understanding teacher, outwit the worst parents and the worst school principal imaginable.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: Worried that his half-vampire grandson isnt showing signs of being a vampire, Dracula enlists his friends to put him through monster-in-training boot camp.

programme.title: How to Train Your Dragon 2
programme.desc: From the Academy Award nominated film How to Train Your Dragon comes the next chapter in the epic trilogy. When Hiccup and Toothless discover a secret ice cave filled with hundreds of wild dragons and a mysterious Dragon Rider, the two friends find themselves at the centre of an epic battle to save the future of men and dragons!

programme.title: Adventures in Zambezia
programme.desc: When a young falcon named Kai learns of the famed bird city of Zambezia, he journeys there against his fathers wishes. But when his dad is captured, Kai must rescue his father and new friends.

programme.title: The Polar Express
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve, a doubting boy boards a magical train thats headed to the North Pole and Santa Clauss home.

programme.title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie
programme.desc: George and Harold are fourth-grade BFFs who love dreaming up funny pranks. One day, they accidentally hypnotise their principal into believing hes a dimwitted hero named Captain Underpants. But when the new schoolteacher turns out to be a disgraced scientist bent on ridding the world of laughter, George, Harold and Captain Underpants must band together to stop his evil agenda.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Travel back to the stone-age in this big-budget treatment of the worlds favourite prehistoric family! Fred Flintstone, a put-upon blue-collar worker struggling to squeak by, with the help of his best buddy Barney and his wife Wilma. After an aptitude test mix up, Fred Flintstone trades his job as Slate and Company Bronto-crane operator for a vice presidency. But theres trouble brewing in Bedrock: An evil executive and his sinister secretary are now plotting to use Fred as the fall guy in an embezzlement scheme!

programme.title: Sing
programme.desc: Buster Moon is a dapper koala who presides over a once grand theatre that has fallen on hard times. Buster is an eternal optimist, and maybe a bit of a scoundrel, who loves his theatre above all and will do anything to preserve it. Now facing the crumbling of his lifes ambition, he has one final chance to restore his fading jewel to its former glory by producing the worlds greatest singing competition.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 4
programme.desc: After three death-defying adventures defeating world-class villains with his unmatched courage and mad martial arts skills, Po, the Dragon Warrior (Golden Globe nominee Jack Black), is called upon by destiny to give it a rest already. More specifically, hes tapped to become the Spiritual Leader of the Valley of Peace.

programme.title: The Pirates! Band of Misfits
programme.desc: Set sail for a fun-filled voyage and hilarious pirate antics with the biggest band of misfits on the seven seas. When the infamous Pirate Captain is shunned once again by his rivals Black Bellamy and Cutlass Liz, he sets his sights to win the coveted Pirate of the Year Award. With his trusted dodo, Polly, and ragtag crew at his side, the Pirate Captain will need to battle a diabolical queen, save a young scientist and never lose sight of what a pirate loves best: adventure.

programme.title: Tad The Lost Explorer
programme.desc: Due to a fortuitous mix-up, Tad, a dreamy construction worker, is mistaken for a famous archaeologist and sent on an expedition to Peru. With the help of Jeff, his faithful dog, an intrepid teacher, a mute parrot and a hustler, they will try to save the mythical Lost City of the Incas from an evil band of treasure hunters.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 2
programme.desc: Po is now living his dream as The Dragon Warrior. But his new life is threatened by the emergence of a formidable villain, who plans to use a secret weapon to conquer China.

programme.title: Over the Hedge
programme.desc: Spring has sprung, and Verne and his woodland friends awaken from their long winters nap to discover that a large, green hedge has cropped up right through the middle of their once-natural habitat. Enter RJ, an opportunistic raccoon who explains that the world beyond the hedge is the gateway to the good life where peculiar creatures called humans live to eat, rather than eat to live. "For humans," RJ proclaims, "enough is never enough."

programme.title: Chicken Run
programme.desc: While the chickens on evil Mrs Tweedys farm dream of a better life, a clever hen named Ginger is hatching plans to fly the coop for good. The only problem is, chickens cant fly or can they? Every escape attempt goes fowl until Rocky, a smooth-talking All-American rooster, crash-lands into the coop. Its hardly poultry in motion when Rocky attempts to teach Ginger and her fine feathered friends to fly but, with teamwork, determination and a little bit of cluck, the fearless flock plots one last daring attempt in a spectacular bid for freedom! Featuring unforgettable characters, incredible animation and all-star voice talent, this instant classic from the academy Award-winning creators of Wallace and Gromit is eggs-traordinary fun for the whole family!

programme.title: Migration
programme.desc: The Mallard family embark on a journey south for the winter to Jamaica via New York City, only for their well-laid plans to go awry, leading to new friends and unknown horizons.

programme.title: Balto
programme.desc: Part husky, part wolf, Balto doesnt know where he belongs. Hes an outcast in Alaska, except to his true friends - Boris, the Russian snow goose, polar bear cubs Muk and Luk, and the beautiful husky, Jenna. Even though hes different, all of Baltos friends recognise what he still cant see himself: his noble spirit. One day, a serious diphtheria epidemic spreads fast among the children of Nome. When a fierce blizzard closes off all routes of transport, theres no way to obtain lifesaving medicine - unless a team of sled dogs can race 965km through the blinding Arctic storm and bring back anti-toxin. But when the dogs get lost in the frozen wilderness, only Balto can rescue the team and save the children.

programme.title: Journey 2: The Mysterious Island
programme.desc: The journey begins when young adventurer Sean receives a coded distress signal from a mysterious island where no island should exist - a place of strange life forms, mountains of gold, deadly volcanoes, and more than one astonishing secret. Unable to stop him from going, Seans new stepfather joins the quest. Together with a helicopter pilot and his beautiful, strong-willed daughter, they set out to find the island, rescue its lone inhabitant and escape before seismic shock waves force the island under the sea and bury its treasures forever.

programme.title: Trolls Band Together
programme.desc: Join Poppy and Branch on their latest adventure as they embark on an epic journey that lead to Branchs reunion with his BroZone brothers, and Poppys long-lost sister, Viva.

programme.title: Grand-Daddy Day Care
programme.desc: When Frank Collins (Reno Wilson) suffers from writers block, he decides to start a day care for his father-in-law (Danny Trejo) and other seniors as a way to make quick cash, while giving him time to still work on his next book. Eventually getting a small group to care for, Frank soon learns that these are not your typical seniors and they cant easily be corralled. With a code enforcement officer challenging the legality of his business, and his senior charges getting into all kinds of trouble, Franks work days become anything but effortless. Featuring an all-star cast of TVs greatest stars, Grand-Daddy Day Care is a hilarious story for the young, and young at heart.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit 2: The Runaway
programme.desc: Adventuring out of the garden, Peter finds himself in a world where his mischief is appreciated. When his family risks everything to come find him, he must figure out what kind of bunny he wants to be.

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie
programme.desc: In this hilarious animated adventure comedy, youll finally find out why the birds are so angry. In an island paradise populated entirely by happy, flightless birds - or almost entirely, Red, a bird with a temper problem, speedy Chuck, and the volatile Bomb have always been outsiders. But when the island is visited by mysterious green piggies, its up to these unlikely outcasts to figure out what the pigs are up to.

programme.title: Nanny McPhee
programme.desc: Move over, Mary Poppins. Nanny McPhee is a wonderfully hideous, mysterious nanny hired to tame seven brats with a feckless father.

When the infamous Pirate Captain is shunned once again by his rivals Black Bellamy and Cutlass Liz, he sets his sights to win the coveted Pirate of the Year Award. With his trusted dodo, Polly, and ragtag crew at his side, the Pirate Captain will need to battle a diabolical queen, save a young scientist and never lose sight of what a pirate loves best: adventure.

programme.title: Nanny McPhee and The Big Bang
programme.desc: Nanny McPhee appears at the door of a stressed young mother, who is trying to run the family farm while her husband is away at war. But once shes arrived, Nanny McPhee discovers that the children are fighting a war of their own against two spoiled city cousins who have just moved in and refuse to leave.

After a near disaster, Universal makes an unlikely deal and doubles down on a fourth movie to save the franchise.

programme.title: Icons Unearthed: Fast And Furious
programme.desc: Universal breaks the mold in Fast Five, reinventing the genre - four movies in - with a heist picture. With bigger and better stunts, international locations and one of Hollywoods biggest stars as their newest antagonist, would the franchises new direction pay off?

programme.title: Stars of the Silver Screen
programme.desc: In-depth profiles of some of the biggest movie stars from the golden age of Hollywood.

programme.title: The Brief History Of Cricket Downunder
programme.desc: Explore Australias sporting fortresses, delve into stories of their distinctive, sometimes unplayable wickets, antagonistic crowds and harsh climates. Meet the iconic batsmen and bowlers, heroic captains, and observe on-field antics ranging from poor behaviour to instances of brilliance and sportsmanship.

programme.title: Landscape Artist of the Year
programme.desc: In this first heat, 8 artists use oils, inks, and raw eggs to tackle Plymouths landmark lighthouse Smeatons Tower, all hoping to impress judges Tai Shan Schierenberg, Kate Bryan and Kathleen Soriano. The winning artist will go through to the semi-final and get one step closer to claiming the prize, a 10,000 pounds commission to create a landscape artwork of Venice for the prestigious Royal Institute of British Architects.

programme.title: Portrait Artist of the Year
programme.desc: In this heat, nine new artists tackle the portraits of actors James Norton and Lesley Manville and musician Raleigh Ritchie as they try and win over judges Tai Shan Schierenberg, Kate Bryan and Kathleen Soriano.

programme.title: Rise of the Billionaires
programme.desc: Our opener kicks off with the rocky start one of the richest men in the world, Jeff Bezos, as he blazes a trail building his era-defining everything store. From clever investors at the dawn of the internet through the dot.com boom and bust, we see what it takes to colonise this brutal new landscape, and how Bezos changed our economy forever. His mansion-house neighbour is none other than Bill Gates, the ageing stag of the young tech bros; whilst simultaneously new kid Elon Musk experiences a challenging start. A story of fierce ambition as they fight to carve up the web. What makes these disruptive pioneers so special?

programme.title: Call Me Ted
programme.desc: Teds complicated relationship with his father leads him to take over the family business after his fathers suicide. Ted expands into radio and TV while pursuing his passion for sailing.

programme.title: Bob Rogers - Voice Of A Generation
programme.desc: World War 2 was raging when an ambitious, depression-raised, 15-year-old kid landed his first job as an office boy at Melbourne radio station 3XY. It would be the start of Bob Rogers dazzling, often controversial career, spanning 7 decades across four states, as he reigned as one of Australias most popular and enduring media stars. Narrated by Tim Webster, this new Foxtel biography features exclusive interviews recorded over the years with both Bob himself, and a host of the nations best known radio and TV stars. Highlights include his place at the birth of rock and roll music and top 40 radio, and reaching a national audience of millions when he joined the Beatles as the British rock revolution swept into Australia. One constant theme of the Bob Rogers story is his fierce individualism and repeated clashes with powerful media owners. His hirings and firings frequently made news headlines, along with his legendary feud with another great radio star, John Laws.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo finds out about Brightons Victorian aquarium, the largest in the world at the time; explores the underground quarries of Godstone; and discovers the wonders of the Crystal Palace.

The winning artist will go through to the semi-final and get one step closer to claiming the prize, a 10,000 pounds commission to create a landscape artwork of Venice for the prestigious Royal Institute of British Architects.

programme.title: The Brief History Of Cricket Downunder
programme.desc: Explore Australias sporting fortresses, delve into stories of their distinctive, sometimes unplayable wickets, antagonistic crowds and harsh climates. Meet the iconic batsmen and bowlers, heroic captains, and observe on-field antics ranging from poor behaviour to instances of brilliance and sportsmanship.

programme.title: Stars of the Silver Screen
programme.desc: In-depth profiles of some of the biggest movie stars from the golden age of Hollywood.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo finds out about Brightons Victorian aquarium, the largest in the world at the time; explores the underground quarries of Godstone; and discovers the wonders of the Crystal Palace.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: In this documentary series, Michael Portillo travels the length and breadth of Britain to see how railways have changed a nation.

programme.title: Icons Unearthed: Fast And Furious
programme.desc: Universal breaks the mold in Fast Five, reinventing the genre - four movies in - with a heist picture. With bigger and better stunts, international locations and one of Hollywoods biggest stars as their newest antagonist, would the franchises new direction pay off?

programme.title: Rise of the Billionaires
programme.desc: Our opener kicks off with the rocky start one of the richest men in the world, Jeff Bezos, as he blazes a trail building his era-defining everything store. From clever investors at the dawn of the internet through the dot.com boom and bust, we see what it takes to colonise this brutal new landscape, and how Bezos changed our economy forever. His mansion-house neighbour is none other than Bill Gates, the ageing stag of the young tech bros; whilst simultaneously new kid Elon Musk experiences a challenging start. A story of fierce ambition as they fight to carve up the web. What makes these disruptive pioneers so special?

programme.title: Bob Rogers - Voice Of A Generation
programme.desc: World War 2 was raging when an ambitious, depression-raised, 15-year-old kid landed his first job as an office boy at Melbourne radio station 3XY. It would be the start of Bob Rogers dazzling, often controversial career, spanning 7 decades across four states, as he reigned as one of Australias most popular and enduring media stars. Narrated by Tim Webster, this new Foxtel biography features exclusive interviews recorded over the years with both Bob himself, and a host of the nations best known radio and TV stars. Highlights include his place at the birth of rock and roll music and top 40 radio, and reaching a national audience of millions when he joined the Beatles as the British rock revolution swept into Australia. One constant theme of the Bob Rogers story is his fierce individualism and repeated clashes with powerful media owners. His hirings and firings frequently made news headlines, along with his legendary feud with another great radio star, John Laws.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo visits the Government Arms Factory at Enfield, the largest machine shop in Europe in Bradshaws day, and discovers how the trains transformed Newmarkets races.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: In this documentary series, Michael Portillo travels the length and breadth of Britain to see how railways have changed a nation.

programme.title: Icons Unearthed: Fast And Furious
programme.desc: With the whole cast back for a 6th and 7th movie and even more ambitious stunts, it seems as if there was no way they could fail. But halfway through filming Furious 7, the ultimate tragedy takes place. Can the family pull together to give their brother one last ride?

programme.title: Landscape Artist of the Year

programme.title: Portrait Artist of the Year
programme.desc: In this fourth heat, another nine artists tackle the portraits of actor Trevor Eve and Parminda Nagra and poet and novelist Ben Okri in a bid to impress judges Tai Shan Schierenberg, Kate Bryan and Kathleen Soriano.

programme.title: Take Every Wave: Life of Laird Hamilton
programme.desc: The remarkable story of an American icon who changed the sport of big wave surfing forever.

programme.title: Boris Becker: The Rise and Fall
programme.desc: Boris Becker was the golden boy of world tennis - the youngest ever Wimbledon champion at just 17. This is the real story of Boris Beckers rise and fall with the help of some of those who know him best.

programme.title: Idiot TV
programme.desc: Features job fails, annoying holidaymakers, and public show-offs. Watch clowns on the job and enjoy Moostafa Mounties Canadian news.

programme.title: Ridiculousness
programme.desc: Rob Dyrdek and friends critique viral videos, categorizing them into "Hot Mess," "Worst Case Scenario," "Redneck Good Times," and "What Happened Last Night".

programme.title: Ridiculousness

programme.title: Taskmaster
programme.desc: Five comedians are set tasks challenging their creativity and wit. The tasks are supervised by Alex Horne but the Taskmaster, Greg Davies, always has the final word.

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.desc: Charlie joins Alan, Herb and his next-door neighbour in a night of alcohol-fuelled sexual reminiscences after Chelsea finds nude pictures of another woman on his phone.

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.desc: Evelyn finally meets Chelsea, and Charlie then tries to prevent them from becoming friends.

programme.title: Outback Truckers
programme.desc: The outback is one of the worlds last wild frontiers. Its vast, untamed and home to some of the toughest places to reach. For the truckers who travel this harsh country, theres only one way to get from A to B: the hard way.

programme.title: Backroad Truckers
programme.desc: Big Donny and Junior get called out to recover a sunken pickup truck but their heavy tow trucks fall victim to the swampy peat bog and Junior needs to act fast to save the familys fleet. After helping Angela with a railroad timbers job, Dave ropes her into repaying the favour. The two fight machines, and each other, while trying to pull an abandoned excavator with Daves army rotator. Dale transports a car for detailing but ends up making the job worse than it should have been.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Lisa returns to Moreno Valley, where it all started, and gets nostalgic with her locker. Kenny welcomes a new granddaughter to the clan and would love to find an appropriate unit. Dusty and Lupe put a little elbow grease into their purchase.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Ivy takes on a supervisory role in Stanton and it leads him to a bit of Slavic success. Brandi tries to help Danielle outfit her new apartment. Lisa gambles on a painting.

programme.title: Idiot TV
programme.desc: The very best falls, faults and fails have been curated and exhibited, using slow motion, rewinds and close-ups to enhance their full-blown stupidity for the silver screen.

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.desc: Evelyn finally meets Chelsea, and Charlie then tries to prevent them from becoming friends.

programme.title: Outback Truckers
programme.desc: The outback is one of the worlds last wild frontiers. Its vast, untamed and home to some of the toughest places to reach. For the truckers who travel this harsh country, theres only one way to get from A to B: the hard way.

programme.title: Backroad Truckers
programme.desc: Big Donny and Junior get called out to recover a sunken pickup truck but their heavy tow trucks fall victim to the swampy peat bog and Junior needs to act fast to save the familys fleet. After helping Angela with a railroad timbers job, Dave ropes her into repaying the favour. The two fight machines, and each other, while trying to pull an abandoned excavator with Daves army rotator. Dale transports a car for detailing but ends up making the job worse than it should have been.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Lisa returns to Moreno Valley, where it all started, and gets nostalgic with her locker. Kenny welcomes a new granddaughter to the clan and would love to find an appropriate unit. Dusty and Lupe put a little elbow grease into their purchase.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Ivy takes on a supervisory role in Stanton and it leads him to a bit of Slavic success. Brandi tries to help Danielle outfit her new apartment. Lisa gambles on a painting.

programme.title: Idiot TV
programme.desc: The very best falls, faults and fails have been curated and exhibited, using slow motion, rewinds and close-ups to enhance their full-blown stupidity for the silver screen.

programme.title: Carrie
programme.desc: A re-imagining of the classic horror tale about Carrie White, a shy girl outcast by her peers and sheltered by her deeply religious mother, who unleashes telekinetic terror on her small town after being pushed too far at her senior prom.

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: The thriller that scared movie fans everywhere out of the water. Three men undertake a perilous journey to hunt down a great white killer shark.

programme.title: Caddo Lake
programme.desc: When an eight-year-old girl mysteriously vanishes, a series of past deaths and disappearances start to link together, forever altering a broken familys history.

programme.title: Dawn of the Dead
programme.desc: When a mysterious virus turns people into mindless, flesh-eating zombies, a handful of survivors wage a desperate, last-stand battle to stay alive - and human.

programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: Nerdy college student Columbus has survived the plague that has turned mankind into flesh-devouring zombies because hes scared of just about everything. Gun-toting, Twinkie-loving Tallahassee has no fears. Together, they are about to stare down their most horrifying challenge yet: each others company.

programme.title: Speak No Evil
programme.desc: A dream holiday turns into a living nightmare when an American couple and their daughter spend the weekend at a British familys idyllic country estate.

programme.title: Apartment 7A
programme.desc: New York City, 1965. What happened in the apartment before Rosemary moved in? A struggling dancer finds herself drawn into dark forces by a peculiar couple promising her fame.

programme.title: The Strangers: Chapter 1
programme.desc: When their car breaks down in an eerie small town, a couple must spend the night in a remote cabin. Panic ensues as they are terrorised by three masked strangers who strike with no mercy.

programme.title: Evil Dead
programme.desc: Five friends head to a remote cabin where they discover the Book of the Dead, and they unwittingly summon up demons living in the nearby woods.

programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: Nerdy college student Columbus has survived the plague that has turned mankind into flesh-devouring zombies because hes scared of just about everything. Gun-toting, Twinkie-loving Tallahassee has no fears. Together, they are about to stare down their most horrifying challenge yet: each others company.

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: In this sly satire, a group of elites gather to hunt ordinary Americans for sport. But one of The Hunted fights back against The Hunters leader.

programme.title: Night Swim
programme.desc: Former baseball player Ray Waller moves into a new home with his family. But a dark secret in the homes past will unleash a malevolent force that will drag the family into the depths of terror.

programme.title: Caddo Lake
programme.desc: When an eight-year-old girl mysteriously vanishes, a series of past deaths and disappearances start to link together, forever altering a broken familys history.

programme.title: Saw X
programme.desc: A sick and desperate John Kramer travels to Mexico for a risky and experimental medical procedure in hopes of a miracle cure for his cancer - only to discover the entire operation is a scam to defraud the vulnerable. Armed with a newfound purpose, the infamous serial killer returns to his work, turning the tables on the con artists in his signature visceral way through devious, deranged, and ingenious traps.

programme.title: Something In The Water
programme.desc: A dream wedding turns into a nightmare when five girlfriends fight for their lives in open water.

programme.title: Jaws 2
programme.desc: Just when you thought it was safe to go back in the water, another shark terrorises the resort of Amity as it recovers from the first man-eater. Police Chief Brody returns to kill.

programme.title: Evil Dead
programme.desc: Five friends head to a remote cabin where they discover the Book of the Dead, and they unwittingly summon up demons living in the nearby woods.

programme.title: The Beast Within
programme.desc: After witnessing her father undergo a terrible transformation, a 10-year-old girl becomes ensnared by the dark ancestral secret that her parents have so desperately tried to conceal.

programme.title: Lisa Frankenstein
programme.desc: A misunderstood teenager and a reanimated Victorian corpse embark on a murderous journey together to find love, happiness, and a few missing body parts.

programme.title: The Watchers
programme.desc: A 28-year-old artist gets stranded in an expansive, untouched forest in western Ireland. Finding shelter, she meets three strangers who are stalked by mysterious creatures every night.

programme.title: Depravity
programme.desc: Friends find themselves on a dangerous path as they try to cover up the death of an innocent man.

programme.title: Abigail
programme.desc: After a group of would-be criminals kidnap the 12-year-old ballerina daughter of a powerful underworld figure, all they have to do to collect a $50 million ransom is watch the girl overnight. In an isolated mansion, the captors start to dwindle, one by one, and they discover, to their mounting horror, that theyre locked inside with no normal little girl.

programme.title: Shaun of the Dead
programme.desc: Get ready for a gut-busting, bone-mashing good time in this hilarious horror comedy. There comes a day in every mans life when he has to get off the couch and kill some zombies. When flesh-eating zombies are on the hunt for a bite to eat, its up to slacker Shaun and his best pal to save their friends and family from becoming the next entree.

programme.title: I Saw the TV Glow
programme.desc: A classmate introduces teenage Owen to a mysterious late-night TV show - a vision of a supernatural world beneath their own. Owens view of reality begins to crack.

programme.title: Longlegs
programme.desc: In pursuit of a serial killer, an FBI agent uncovers a series of occult clues that she must solve to end his terrifying killing spree.

programme.title: Smile 2
programme.desc: About to embark on a world tour, global pop sensation Skye Riley begins experiencing increasingly terrifying and inexplicable events. Overwhelmed by the escalating horrors and the pressures of fame, Skye is forced to face her past.

programme.title: Youll Never Find Me
programme.desc: An isolated man living at the back of a desolate caravan park is visited by a desperate young woman seeking shelter from a violent storm. As the savage storm worsens, these solitary souls begin to feel threatened, but who should really be afraid?

programme.title: A Quiet Place: Day One
programme.desc: A young woman named Sam finds herself trapped in New York City during the early stages of an invasion by alien creatures with ultra-sensitive hearing.

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: Kevin has evidenced 23 personalities to his trusted psychiatrist, Dr Fletcher, but there remains one still submerged who is set to materialise and dominate all the others. Compelled to abduct three teenage girls, led by the wilful, observant Casey, Kevin reaches a war for survival among all of those contained within him, as well as everyone around him, as the walls between his compartments shatter apart.

programme.desc: Adult film star and aspiring actress Maxine Minx finally gets her big break. However, as a mysterious killer stalks the starlets of LA, a trail of blood threatens to reveal her sinister past.

programme.desc: Just when you thought it was safe to go back in the water, another shark terrorises the resort of Amity as it recovers from the first man-eater. Police Chief Brody returns to kill.

programme.title: Evil Dead
programme.desc: Five friends head to a remote cabin where they discover the Book of the Dead, and they unwittingly summon up demons living in the nearby woods.

programme.title: The Beast Within
programme.desc: After witnessing her father undergo a terrible transformation, a 10-year-old girl becomes ensnared by the dark ancestral secret that her parents have so desperately tried to conceal.

programme.title: Lisa Frankenstein
programme.desc: A misunderstood teenager and a reanimated Victorian corpse embark on a murderous journey together to find love, happiness, and a few missing body parts.

programme.title: The Watchers
programme.desc: A 28-year-old artist gets stranded in an expansive, untouched forest in western Ireland. Finding shelter, she meets three strangers who are stalked by mysterious creatures every night.

programme.title: Depravity
programme.desc: Friends find themselves on a dangerous path as they try to cover up the death of an innocent man.

programme.title: Abigail
programme.desc: After a group of would-be criminals kidnap the 12-year-old ballerina daughter of a powerful underworld figure, all they have to do to collect a $50 million ransom is watch the girl overnight. In an isolated mansion, the captors start to dwindle, one by one, and they discover, to their mounting horror, that theyre locked inside with no normal little girl.

programme.title: Shaun of the Dead
programme.desc: Get ready for a gut-busting, bone-mashing good time in this hilarious horror comedy. There comes a day in every mans life when he has to get off the couch and kill some zombies. When flesh-eating zombies are on the hunt for a bite to eat, its up to slacker Shaun and his best pal to save their friends and family from becoming the next entree.

programme.title: I Saw the TV Glow
programme.desc: A classmate introduces teenage Owen to a mysterious late-night TV show - a vision of a supernatural world beneath their own. Owens view of reality begins to crack.

programme.title: Longlegs
programme.desc: In pursuit of a serial killer, an FBI agent uncovers a series of occult clues that she must solve to end his terrifying killing spree.

programme.title: Smile 2
programme.desc: About to embark on a world tour, global pop sensation Skye Riley begins experiencing increasingly terrifying and inexplicable events. Overwhelmed by the escalating horrors and the pressures of fame, Skye is forced to face her past.

programme.title: Youll Never Find Me
programme.desc: An isolated man living at the back of a desolate caravan park is visited by a desperate young woman seeking shelter from a violent storm. As the savage storm worsens, these solitary souls begin to feel threatened, but who should really be afraid?

programme.title: A Quiet Place: Day One
programme.desc: A young woman named Sam finds herself trapped in New York City during the early stages of an invasion by alien creatures with ultra-sensitive hearing.

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: Kevin has evidenced 23 personalities to his trusted psychiatrist, Dr Fletcher, but there remains one still submerged who is set to materialise and dominate all the others. Compelled to abduct three teenage girls, led by the wilful, observant Casey, Kevin reaches a war for survival among all of those contained within him, as well as everyone around him, as the walls between his compartments shatter apart.

programme.title: MaXXXine
programme.desc: Adult film star and aspiring actress Maxine Minx finally gets her big break. However, as a mysterious killer stalks the starlets of LA, a trail of blood threatens to reveal her sinister past.

programme.title: Once Upon A Time... In Hollywood
programme.desc: The highly anticipated 9th film from Quentin Tarantino. In 1969 Los Angeles, during the Charles Manson murders, a TV actor and his stunt double, embark on an odyssey to make a name for themselves in the film industry.

programme.title: World War Z
programme.desc: The story revolves around United Nations employee Gerry Lane, who traverses the world in a race against time to stop a pandemic that is toppling armies and governments and threatening to decimate humanity itself.

programme.title: Caddo Lake
programme.desc: When an eight-year-old girl mysteriously vanishes, a series of past deaths and disappearances start to link together, forever altering a broken familys history.

programme.title: Transformers: Dark of the Moon
programme.desc: A mysterious event from Earths past threatens to ignite a war so big that the Transformers alone will not be able to save the planet. Sam Witwicky and the Autobots must fight against the darkness to defend our world from the Decepticons all-consuming evil.

programme.title: Pacific Rim: Uprising
programme.desc: The globe-spanning conflict between otherworldly monsters of mass destruction and the human-piloted supermachines built to vanquish them was only a prelude to the all-out assault on humanity in "Pacific Rim Uprising." Jake Pentecost, is a once-promising Jaeger pilot whose legendary father gave his life to secure humanitys victory against the monstrous "Kaiju." Jake has since abandoned his training only to become caught up in a criminal underworld. But when an even more unstoppable threat is unleashed to tear through our cities and bring the world to its knees, he is given one last chance to live up to his fathers legacy by his estranged sister, Mako Mori who is leading a brave new generation of pilots that have grown up in the shadow of war. As they seek justice for the fallen, their only hope is to unite together in a global uprising against the forces of extinction.

programme.title: The Prestige
programme.desc: The mysterious story of two magicians whose intense rivalry leads them on a lifelong battle for supremacy full of obsession, deceit, and jealousy with dangerous and deadly consequences. From the time that they first met as young magicians on the rise, Robert Anglier and Alfred Borden were competitors. However, their friendly competition evolves into a bitter rivalry making them fierce enemies-for-life and consequently jeopardising the lives of everyone around them. Full of twists and turns, this film is set against the backdrop of turn-of-the-century London.

programme.title: Once Upon A Time... In Hollywood
programme.desc: The highly anticipated 9th film from Quentin Tarantino. In 1969 Los Angeles, during the Charles Manson murders, a TV actor and his stunt double, embark on an odyssey to make a name for themselves in the film industry.

programme.title: Firebrand
programme.desc: Katherine Parr, Henry VIIIs sixth wife, becomes regent while he battles abroad. When he returns sick and paranoid, she must fight for her survival.

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: Based on the classic Hasbro naval combat game, this is the story of an international fleet of ships that come across an alien armada while on naval war games exercise.

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: When he is ruled to be property and not a person, a foul-mouthed teddy bear seeks the aid of a legendary civil rights attorney to gain the justice he deserves.

programme.title: The Italian Job
programme.desc: The plan was flawless. The execution was perfect. Charlie Croker pulled off the crime of a lifetime. The one thing that, he didnt plan on was being double-crossed. Now he wants more than the jobs payoff, he wants payback.

programme.title: The Italian Job
programme.desc: The plan was flawless. The execution was perfect. Charlie Croker pulled off the crime of a lifetime. The one thing that, he didnt plan on was being double-crossed. Now he wants more than the jobs payoff, he wants payback.

programme.title: Uncharted
programme.desc: Street-smart Nathan Drake is recruited by seasoned treasure hunter Victor Sully Sullivan to recover a fortune amassed by Ferdinand Magellan, and lost 500 years ago.

programme.title: The Hunt for Red October
programme.desc: A new, technologically superior Soviet nuclear sub, the Red October, is heading for the US coast under the command of Captain Marko Ramius. The American government thinks Ramius is planning to attack. A lone CIA analyst has a different idea: he thinks Ramius is planning to defect, but he has only a few hours to find him and prove it - because the entire Russian naval and air commands are trying to find him, too. The hunt is on.

programme.title: Transformers: Age of Extinction
programme.desc: This film begins after an epic battle left a great city torn, but with the world saved. As humanity picks up the pieces, a shadowy group reveals itself in an attempt to control the direction of history, while an ancient, powerful new menace sets Earth in its crosshairs. With help from a new cast of humans, Optimus Prime and the Autobots rise to meet their most fearsome challenge yet. In an incredible adventure, they are swept up in a war of good and evil, ultimately leading to a climactic battle across the world.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger
programme.desc: Jack Ryan is called into action when a prominent businessman, who may be connected to Colombian drug cartels, is murdered.

programme.title: Smile 2
programme.desc: About to embark on a world tour, global pop sensation Skye Riley begins experiencing increasingly terrifying and inexplicable events. Overwhelmed by the escalating horrors and the pressures of fame, Skye is forced to face her past.

programme.title: The Dark Knight
programme.desc: With the help of Lt. Jim Gordon and District Attorney Harvey Dent, Batman sets out to destroy organised crime in Gotham for good. The triumvirate proves effective, but soon find themselves prey to a rising criminal mastermind known as The Joker, who thrusts Gotham into anarchy and forces Batman closer to crossing the fine line between hero and vigilante.

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
programme.desc: When convicted street racer Sean Boswell tries to start a new life on the other side of the world, his obsession with racing sets him on a collision course with the Japanese underworld. To survive, he will have to master drifting - a new style of racing where tricked-out cars slide through hairpin turns, defying gravity and death for the ultimate road rush.

programme.title: Waterworld
programme.desc: Earth is covered with water and the human race struggles to survive on dilapidated boats and makeshift floating cities. A drifter becomes caught up in the struggle between the evil Deacon and a childs secret key to a wondrous place called "Dryland."

programme.title: French Girl
programme.desc: Gordon, a high school teacher from Brooklyn, goes with his girlfriend and chef Sophie to her hometown of Quebec City, where she is testing for the Michelin 3-star restaurant of Ruby Collins.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winters War
programme.desc: Evil Queen Ravenna betrays her good sister, Freya, with an unforgivable act, freezing Freyas heart of love and unleashing in her an icy power she never knew she possessed. Retreating to a kingdom far to the north, Freya raises an army of Huntsmen as her protectors, with the only rule that no two of them should ever fall in love.

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: The continuing story of the Crawley family.

programme.title: Venom: Let There Be Carnage
programme.desc: In search of his next big story, Eddie lands an exclusive interview with convicted murderer and death row inmate Cletus Kasady,

programme.title: Men in Black
programme.desc: Men in Black follows the exploits of Agents Kay and Jay, members of a top-secret organization established to monitor alien activity on Earth. The two MIB find themselves in the middle of a deadly plot by an intergalactic terrorist, who has arrived on Earth to assassinate two ambassadors from opposing galaxies. Kay and Jay face a simple imperative: track down the interloper or Earth will be destroyed. Its all in a days work for the Men in Black.
