programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Home
programme.desc: Jodi and Mel, Drew and Jonathans best friends from college, almost gave up on owning a home. The 70s-style house desperately needs an update, but it is in a desirable neighbourhood and has solid bones.

programme.title: Buying and Selling
programme.desc: Lesley and her son moved in with Ryan and his two boys, but the house is way too small for their blended family and they desperately need more space. Drew and Jonathan step in to kick-start the familys future.

programme.title: Buying and Selling
programme.desc: Craig and Simone are ready to leave the suburbs for good, and are searching for a family home where theyll have more time to enjoy the good life. Drew and Jonathan have a plan for a total property facelift.

programme.title: My Dream Home
programme.desc: Empty nesters Karen and Rick sold their house the first day it was on the market, and so theyve moved into her mums home until they can find a deluxe retreat where they can hang with their four grandsons in style. Drew lines up some great family-friendly properties and then leverages the results of a home inspection at the negotiating table. Later, Jonathan has big plans to inject French country charm into a dated fixer-upper, and home decor enthusiast Karen definitely has something to say about it.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: A Canadian couple look to purchase a vacation home that will one day become their retirement home. Ben and Erin restore a Craftsman cottage to give these out-of-towners a true Southern experience.

programme.title: Fixer to Fabulous
programme.desc: A couple with family across the country want to turn their century-old barn into a home. Dave and Jenny take on this massive project and transform their rustic barn into a modern space.

programme.title: House Hunters Renovation
programme.desc: Home buyers tour for-sale homes and choose the one that is the perfect fixer-upper.

programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Home
programme.desc: Bob and reiki master Denise need help revamping their home to make it a space with positive energy and flow. Drew and Jonathan transform the front entry, living room and dining room.

programme.title: Designing the Hebrides
programme.desc: Banjo and his team travel to the Isle of Skye to transform an out-of-date cafe and bookshop. Will Banjos decision to spend almost the whole budget on a huge stained-glass window payoff?

programme.title: Designing the Hebrides
programme.desc: Banjo and his team get to transform a much loved family-run fish shop on the Isle of Mull. He has bold ambitions but can he convince the owners to trust his daring designs?

programme.title: Home Town Takeover
programme.desc: The renewal of Fort Morgan, Colorado, continues as Ben and Erin give the towns struggling Main Street a facelift.

programme.title: My Dream Home
programme.desc: Drew and Jonathan Scott help offer property advice to Jeanette and Tony, who are in-between places and being forced to stay with friends.

programme.title: Love It or List It Vancouver
programme.desc: Now theyre retired, Rob and Violet want to enjoy the good life but their multi-level townhouse near the beach makes it tough to entertain. Can Jillian convince Violet to stay with a contemporary redesign?

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Jean Johansson is helping photographer Sue, and rock singer Chris, find their dream home in the north of Limousin. They fell in love with this beautiful and historic region, known as the Lake District of France.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Married couple of 33 years Kathryn and Mark are dreaming of finding their new forever home on the beautiful Kassandra Peninsula in the north of Greece and have asked Laura Hamilton for help.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Jonnie Irwin is helping Steve and Aniko escape the rat race and move to the peace and quiet of the French countryside in West Brittany.

programme.title: Cyberstalker
programme.desc: Thirteen years ago, Aidens world was torn apart after an online stalker followed her into the real world and broke into her home to claim the object of his desire. The resulting night of terror ended with the murders of both Aidens mother and father. The stalker escaped the scene without Aiden seeing his face; he is gone without a trace, an unknown man, a murderer now watching Aidens every move. To escape this danger Aiden spends the next 13 years offline, in therapy and secluded anonymity. Who should Aiden trust in a web of deception where no one may be who they seem? There is nowhere for Aiden to hide when someone wants to love her to death. Mischa Barton, Dan Levy and Ron Lea star. (2012)

programme.title: The Perfect Teacher
programme.desc: When spoiled, beautiful high-schooler Devon sets her sights on her handsome teacher, she wont take no for an answer.

programme.title: If There Be Thorns
programme.desc: With Christopher and Cathy Dollanganger living together as man and wife, Cathys two sons are unaware of the incestuous nature of their parents relationship. But when a mysterious woman moves in next door and befriends the younger boy, Bart, he begins a strange transformation and displays accusatory behaviour towards Cathy and Christopher. When Christopher discovers their mysterious neighbour is, in fact, his mother Corrine Dollanganger, all of the familys long-hidden secrets are revealed in a tragic climax.

programme.title: The Pastors Wife
programme.desc: Mary, a dutiful preachers wife and mother of three, becomes the prime suspect in her husbands murder. What went on behind this perfect familys closed doors? Based on a true story.

programme.title: My Amish Double Life
programme.desc: Emma is a young Amish woman who leads a double life by sneaking out to clubs to flirt and have fun. However, when she accidentally witnesses a murder, her life and community get thrown into peril.

programme.title: Wife Stalker
programme.desc: Joannas obsessive fantasy of a perfect life with Leo shatters, forcing her to confront harsh reality and the truth about their relationship, with dire consequences.

programme.title: You Better Watch Out
programme.desc: Aubreys plane is grounded due to a snowstorm, leaving her stranded for the night at a small town airport. She stumbles into the middle of a kidnapping and throws herself into danger as she tries to save the young girl stranded with them.

programme.title: I Was Octomom
programme.desc: In 2009, Natalie Suleman gives birth to eight children with the help of IVF, only to have her life torn apart, and her identity rebranded by the media.

programme.title: How She Caught a Killer
programme.desc: Inspired by the real story of a female detective who went undercover to catch The Route 40 Killer.

programme.title: Waking Up To Danger
programme.desc: A young mother picks up the pieces after a horrible accident damages her memory. She soon suspects her husbands indiscretions are what caused her suffering and that her family is in danger.

programme.title: V.C Andrews Ruby
programme.desc: In the heart of the bayou, Ruby Landry lives a simple, happy life. The only family Ruby Landry has ever known are her loving guardian, Grandmere Catherine, a Cajun spiritual healer, and her drunken, outcast Grandpere Jack. Her life is filled with hope and promise, especially when her attraction for handsome Paul Tate blossoms into a mysterious, wonderful love. But Pauls wealthy parents forbid him to associate with a poor Landry while Grandmere urges her to follow her dream of becoming a great painter. In a faded photograph, Ruby glimpses for the first time the image of her father and learns of a shameful deception and a shocking scheme of blackmail that now must come to light. Stunned by these revelations, she is devastated when Grandmere dies, leaving her to seek out her father in his vast New Orleans mansion. There, in a house of lies, madness, and cruel torment, Ruby clings to her memories of Paul to keep her heart alive. For only their love can save her now.

programme.title: Girl in the Box
programme.desc: In 1977, 22-year-old Colleen Stan doesnt think twice when she hitch hikes and is picked up by a young couple, Cameron and Janice Hooker. But the life she knows is completely ripped away when the couple abducts her and takes her to their home where Cameron tortures and sexually abuses her. For the next seven years, Colleen is imprisoned for up to 23 hours a day, in a coffin-sized box hidden beneath the couples bed. When not incarcerated, Colleen is part of a strange new life as a live-in slave, babysitter, and victim of Camerons bizarre and extreme sexual fantasies.

programme.title: The Beach House Murders
programme.desc: A lonely female novelist becomes a prime suspect in a homicide after a one-night tryst with a mysterious stranger who turns up dead at her summer home.

programme.title: Kidnapping in the Grand Canyon
programme.desc: When two best friends hiking the Grand Canyon trust an experienced hiking guide to bring them on an off trail adventure, things go south when he takes them captive, and they have to fight both man and nature to make it out.

programme.title: A Roommate to Die For
programme.desc: After a nasty break-up, Faith needs a new roommate to supplement the rent and finds that something very strange is going on with the tenant who decides to move in.

programme.title: Nightmare School Moms
programme.desc: Two mothers battle to see which of their overachieving daughters will be accepted to a prestigious university. However, when one of their methods quickly spirals out of control, the games turn deadly.

programme.title: Greed: A Seven Deadly Sins Story
programme.desc: When interior decorator Zuri Maxwell meets a handsome benefactor and entrepreneur, she compromises the values and morals that should guide her, in an effort to be part of his world.

programme.title: Amish Stud: The Eli Weaver Story
programme.desc: A man who calls himself Amish Stud plots with his mistress to murder his wife, to the horror of his conservative Amish community.

programme.title: Lies Between Friends
programme.desc: A wealthy familys life is upended when the 18-year-old daughter of a family friend comes to live with them for a few months.

programme.title: The Bear Lake Murders
programme.desc: A sheriff teams up with a detective to uncover the truth behind a series of annual deaths in a resort town. Their investigation leads them to believe that a killer is preying on holidaymakers.

programme.title: Love Triangle Nightmare
programme.desc: Brittany meets a stranger who has everything she wants in a partner and despite being an unknown man as warned by others, she falls in love with him which leads to something tragic.

programme.title: Sisters
programme.desc: A reporter who witnesses a brutal murder becomes entangled in a mystery involving conjoined twins who were separated at birth.

programme.title: The Secret Sex Life of a Single Mom
programme.desc: A divorced woman finds sexual liberation through online dating.Based on the book of the true life story of author Delaine Moore. Delaine Morris, mother of two, realizes shes completely lost herself after years of being in an emotionally abusive marriage with her husband Robert. On a mission to recover (and discover) her own identity, she meets "The Duke" who promises to teach her how to become an alpha female and embrace the woman she really wants to be. But theres one little catch, although shes learned how to get a guy and have the relationship she deserves, she cant seem to get one man out of her mind, "The Duke."

programme.title: From Straight As to XXX
programme.desc: Based on the true story of Duke University student Miriam Weeks, also known as Belle Knox. From Straight As to XXX tells the true story of Miriam Weeks, who as a freshman at Duke University looking to make money to cover tuition, became infamously known for starring in online pornography under the pseudonym, Belle Knox. The Miriam Weeks/ Belle Knox story represents the hypocrisy of "slut-shaming." Portrayed as neither a villain nor a hero, Belle Knox is a young woman who made a choice that changed her life forever.

programme.title: Framed by My Husband
programme.desc: When Junes wealthy husband Rick becomes the target of an extortionist who claims he sexually assaulted her, Rick convinces his wife its an act of revenge by a spurned suitor, and enlists her help to prevent the accusations from going public. June agrees to help him pay off the extortionist, but when the woman is found dead, June becomes the prime suspect.

programme.title: Expecting Amish
programme.desc: When an eventful Rumspringa leads to an unintended pregnancy, Amish teen Hannah must choose between returning to faith and family or beginning a new life elsewhere.

programme.title: Hunt for the Labyrinth Killer
programme.desc: An ace ADA works with a driven cop to catch Daedalus, a serial killer infamous for luring his victims to their deaths with elaborate traps.

programme.title: My Child has My Doctors Face
programme.desc: Jessica discovers that his biological father is actually her fertility doctor, she teams up with another one of the doctors clients to bring him to justice.

programme.title: Hoax: The Kidnapping of Sherri Papini
programme.desc: In 2016, Sherri Papini goes for a run and doesnt come home. This Northern California missing person case quickly becomes a national story when she returns and her story about being abducted doesnt add up.

programme.title: Couples Retreat Murder
programme.desc: Becky and Jim head to a remote couples retreat to try and save their marriage. However, when a guest goes missing and their host is found dead, they start to wonder who else theyre trapped with.

programme.title: Theres a New Killer in Town
programme.desc: Alices small town routine is upended when writer Ronnie sweeps into her life. But with this new friend comes a series of inexplicable events that soon plunges Alice and her entire town into danger.

programme.title: Your Boyfriend Is Mine
programme.desc: Over the objection of his girlfriend, Ben agrees to take a job as the live-in manservant to a wealthy businesswoman, Amanda, but quickly realises he has made a deal with the devil, and has put himself and his girlfriend in mortal jeopardy.

programme.title: Spinning Out Of Control
programme.desc: Infatuated and obsessed with a fitness instructor, Natalie hatches a devious plan to eliminate everyone in the young womans life so she can have her all to herself.

programme.title: Secrets In The Desert
programme.desc: While on a road trip through the desert, Charlie and her boyfriend Aidan break down in the middle of nowhere. While Aidan waits for a tow truck, Charlie heads to a nearby diner to find help. When Aidan goes missing, Charlie finds herself stranded in a strange town unsure who to trust. The only thing she knows is she might just be their only chance to get out alive.

programme.title: Houseboat
programme.desc: A widowed man and his three children fall for an Italian woman who joins their floating home as housekeeper. He wins both their love and hers too.

programme.title: Grumpy Old Men
programme.desc: Two elderly, eccentric, next-door neighbours sustain a rancorous relationship that only a wise observer could recognise as a very special friendship. When a lonely, flamboyant, middle-aged widow moves in across the street from them, the male rivalry begins.

programme.title: The Karate Kid: Part III
programme.desc: A bad guy from the original Karate Kid plots revenge on young Daniel and his mentor Miyagi after they defeat his karate school and ruin his business.

programme.title: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
programme.desc: While visiting the Earth at Night, a group of alien botanists is discovered and disturbed by an approaching human task force. Because of the more than hasty take-off, one of the visitors is left behind. The little alien finds himself all alone on a very strange planet. Fortunately, the extra-terrestrial soon finds a friend and emotional companion in 10-year-old Elliot, who discovered him looking for food in his familys garden shed. While E.T. slowly gets acquainted with Elliots brother Michael, his sister Gertie as well as with Earth customs, members of the task force work day and night to track down the whereabouts of Earths first visitor from Outer Space.

programme.title: The Meaning of Life
programme.desc: The Monty Python team tackle this weighty subject in a series of sketches involving body parts, religion, the wonders of war, the miracle of birth, and a preview of what awaits in heaven.

programme.title: The Blues Brothers
programme.desc: After the release of Jake Blues from prison, he and brother Elwood go to visit the orphanage where they were raised by nuns. They learn that the church stopped its support and will sell the place unless the tax on the property is paid within 11 days. The brothers decide to raise the money by putting their blues band back together and staging a big gig. They may be on a mission from God but theyre making enemies everywhere they go.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: An eccentric chemistry professor discovers an elixir which turns him into a pop idol.

programme.title: Houseboat
programme.desc: A widowed man and his three children fall for an Italian woman who joins their floating home as housekeeper. He wins both their love and hers too.

The brothers decide to raise the money by putting their blues band back together and staging a big gig. They may be on a mission from God but theyre making enemies everywhere they go.

programme.title: Innerspace
programme.desc: A test pilot is miniaturised in a secret experiment, and accidentally injected into a hapless store clerk.

programme.title: Trading Places
programme.desc: A story of a down-and-out con artist who trades lifestyles with a well-to-do investor. Two wealthy power players set the wheels turning with a crazy bet and the comedy gets richer by the minute.

programme.title: U.S. Marshals
programme.desc: We are initiating a hard-target search for a fugitive in an ever-widening perimeter. We will navigate swamps, prowl Manhattan streets, search every house and doghouse. And since Marshal Sam Gerard leads the hunt, we will experience suspense, action and daring twists every step of the way.

programme.title: Waterworld
programme.desc: Earth is covered with water and the human race struggles to survive on dilapidated boats and makeshift floating cities. A drifter becomes caught up in the struggle between the evil Deacon and a childs secret key to a wondrous place called "Dryland."

programme.title: Dantes Peak
programme.desc: An action-packed story about the incomparable power of nature and mankinds unending will to survive. When unusual seismic activity is detected in the charming little Pacific Northwest town of Dantes Peak, US. Geological Survey volcanologist Harry Dalton is called in to investigate. Certain that a long-dormant volcano is set to erupt and the townspeople are in danger, he convinces Mayor Rachel Wando to take action. Now the race is on to evacuate the town before its too late, in this gripping adventure thats filled with adrenaline-fueled action and spectacular special effects.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger
programme.desc: Jack Ryan is called into action when a prominent businessman, who may be connected to Colombian drug cartels, is murdered.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Dr Sherman Klump, a kind, calorically challenged genetics professor who longs to shed his 400-pound frame in order to win the heart of the beautiful Carla Purty. So, with one swig of his experimental fat-reducing serum, Sherman becomes Buddy Love, a fast-talking, pumped up, plumped-down Don Juan. Can Sherman stop his buff alter ego before its too late, or will Buddy have the last laugh?

programme.title: Junior
programme.desc: Youll never guess whos going to have a baby. Watch as the maternal tables are turned forever when, after taking an experimental drug, a male scientist becomes pregnant.

programme.title: Look Whos Talking Now
programme.desc: The holidays are approaching and the Ubriacco household is wrapped up in more turmoil than tinsel. James has unexpectedly found prosperity and job satisfaction as a highly paid private pilot for Samantha DBonne, the glamorous president of an international cosmetics firm. But while her husband is winging around the world, Mollie has to juggle her role as mum with her duties at her new job, labouring as an elf for a department store Santa.

programme.title: Out of Africa
programme.desc: Karen Blixen establishes a plantation in Africa. Meeting her true love, Denys, allows her to rethink her priorities in the midst of this vast land.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Akirra asks for help to stop her baes ex, Jamie, from harassing her and William. But the script is flipped when Nev and Kamie find out that William has received thousands of dollars from Jamie.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Single father DeJohn is so in love with online beauty Cashay that hes ready to propose, but his brother Adonis is convinced Cashay is a lie. With a diamond on the line, can Nev and Kamie find DeJohns dream girl?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Nev and Kamie get a letter from a woman worried that her friend Danielle is being catfished by a guy named BJ. BJ comforted Danielle when she was shot, but now she needs to know who shes really been dating.

programme.title: Are You The One?
programme.desc: The strongest couples in the house are put on blast as people begin to question their connections. Michael shakes up the house by trying to break up multiple relationships.

programme.title: Are You The One?
programme.desc: A game of harmless fun sends one couple to heartbreak city. Frustration grows between couples who are getting in too deep and singles who are struggling to make connections.

programme.title: Ridiculousness
programme.desc: On an all-new episode of Ridiculousness Rob, Chanel, and Steelo go ALONG FOR THE RIDE, get photobombed by GRAMLINS, and get a bad case of CRYARRHEA.

programme.title: Ridiculousness
programme.desc: Rob, Chanel, and Steelo show us why you should Always Wear a Helmet, talk about unwanted gifts in Thanks, I Guess, and visit the worlds worst theme park.

programme.title: Ridiculousness
programme.desc: Rob, Chanel, and Steelo talk about people with ridiculous stuff in their pockets in Out of Pocket, and locations that are a Bad Place to Park.

programme.title: Ridiculousness
programme.desc: In an all new episode of Ridiculousness, Rob and Steelo welcome Lolo Wood to chug some water in staying hydrated.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Anthony is a Iraq War veteran who wears his Purple Heart on his sleeve. Over a year ago, he bonded online with a caring, emotionally available man named Marq. Today, theyre head over heels in love - but what is Marq hiding?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Luis has fallen in love with a single mum who is down on her luck and now hes ready to take their online relationship to the next level. Nev and Max help him make sure that she is who she says she is.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Lucille led a simple life until she was asked to work for an up and coming music producer named Kidd Cole. One day Kidd couldnt be found. Will Lucille get the answers she needs?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: When Brittany finds love online with Bryon, a Marine who may get deployed again to Iraq, she seeks Nev and Maxs help before time runs out to discover if her seemingly perfect military man is real.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Hundra never planned on falling in love with a girl and now she is risking coming out on national TV to learn if her love with Emily is for real. Special guest Machine Gun Kelly teams with Nev to reveal a shocking catfish.

programme.title: Help! Im In A Secret Relationship
programme.desc: Jelena and Raeshib met as potential roommates and now live together as a couple. She introduced him to her family in Serbia, where he converted to her faith to marry her.

programme.title: Caught in the Act: Unfaithful
programme.desc: Miniyah manages her girlfriend Jays bookings as a private dancer. However, Jays sudden need for space has led to her moving out of their home together.

programme.title: Ridiculousness
programme.desc: Rob, Chanel, and Steelo check out some Human Hamsters, see whos getting around with No Gas Money, and crack a few Fresh Eggs.

programme.title: Ridiculousness
programme.desc: In an all new episode of Ridiculousness, Rob and Steelo welcome Lolo Wood to chug some water in staying hydrated.

programme.title: Ridiculousness
programme.desc: On an all-new episode of Ridiculousness, Rob and Sterling are joined by Lolo Wood where they find out how to be a casual criminal and learn about the zodiac in The Faults In Your Stars.

programme.title: Teen Mom: The Next Chapter
programme.sub-title: Ready or Not Here Baby Comes
programme.desc: Maci and Bentley meet Ryans new daughter Presley. Cate and Tyler seek Dr. Drews guidance. Cheyenne and Zach see a relationship coach as they navigate fertility issues. Briana has the sex talk with Nova and gives her a baby simulator.

programme.title: Aussie Shore
programme.desc: Its the first day in the Aussie Shore house, and eight new Shories arrive for a summer of partying, outrageous antics, no-holds-barred hook-ups and romantic messiness in the non-stop party town of Cairns.

programme.title: Ridiculousness
programme.desc: Rob, Steelo and special guest Rocsi Diaz flip out while having some Table Rage, and try not to get cut by some Stabby Babies.

programme.title: Ridiculousness
programme.desc: In an all new episode of Ridiculousness, Rob and Steelo welcome Rosci Diaz to check out CANINE CAR CATASTROPHES, hear everyones CRAPPY CONFESSIONS and see who wins UNAMAZING RACES.

programme.title: Ridiculousness
programme.desc: Rob and Steelo welcome Rocsi Diaz to appreciate the beauty all around us in Everyday Awe and have fun day drinking in Brunch Drunk.

programme.title: Ridiculousness
programme.desc: Rob, Steelo, and Camille Kostek meet some people who are Fully Out, and watch some people get brave thanks to Liquid Courage.

programme.title: Just Tattoo Of Us
programme.sub-title: The Queen of Mean Meets Her Match
programme.desc: New artist Jamie takes on the Queen of Mean, Charl. Best mates Tanesha and Adriana serve each other tough love.

programme.title: Just Tattoo Of Us

programme.title: Dune: Part Two
programme.desc: Dune: Part Two will explore the mythic journey of Paul Atreides as he unites with Chani and the Fremen while on a warpath of revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family. Facing a choice between the love of his life and the fate of the known universe, he endeavors to prevent a terrible future only he can foresee.

programme.title: My Penguin Friend
programme.desc: Inspired by a true story, an enchanting adventure about a lost penguin rescued from an oil spill, who transforms the life of a heartbroken fisherman. They soon become unlikely friends, so bonded that even the vast ocean cannot divide them.

programme.title: Freediver
programme.desc: Alexey Molchanovs daring attempt to set multiple freediving world records in 2023, paying tribute to his late mother while confronting adversity and testing the boundaries of human endurance in this extreme sport.

programme.title: Diddy: The Making of a Bad Boy
programme.desc: Exploring Diddys journey from Sean Combs to Puffy and Diddy, his childhood, music career, and the recent sexual misconduct allegations that challenge perceptions.

programme.title: Turtles All the Way Down
programme.desc: When a 16-year-old struggling with obsessive-compulsive disorder reconnects with her childhood crush, she confronts the possibility of finding love and happiness in the face of mental illness.

programme.title: Anora
programme.desc: Anora, a Brooklyn sex worker, marries an oligarchs son. But when the news reaches Russia, his parents rush to New York to have the marriage annulled, threatening her fairytale.

programme.title: The Bikeriders
programme.desc: After a chance encounter, headstrong Kathy is drawn to Benny, member of Midwestern motorcycle club the Vandals. As the club transforms into a dangerous underworld of violence, Benny must choose between Kathy and his loyalty to the club.

programme.title: Rumours
programme.desc: Leaders of the wealthiest democracies face absurd challenges as night falls in misty woods, realising they are suddenly alone and struggling with their incompetence.

programme.title: Cassino in Ischia
programme.desc: Nic Cassino goes to Italy to work with struggling Italian directors on the first-ever "Neo-Realist" action movie in an effort to revitalize his career.

programme.title: Firebrand
programme.desc: Katherine Parr, Henry VIIIs sixth wife, becomes regent while he battles abroad. When he returns sick and paranoid, she must fight for her survival.

programme.title: Thelma
programme.desc: When 93-year-old Thelma Post gets duped by a phone scammer pretending to be her grandson, she sets out on a treacherous quest across the city to reclaim what was taken from her.

programme.title: Turtles All the Way Down
programme.desc: When a 16-year-old struggling with obsessive-compulsive disorder reconnects with her childhood crush, she confronts the possibility of finding love and happiness in the face of mental illness.

programme.title: The Fabulous Four
programme.desc: If threes a crowd, fours a party! A group of life-long friends travel to Key West, Florida, to be bridesmaids in the surprise wedding of their best college girlfriend Marilyn. Over the course of one outrageous trip, sisterhoods are rekindled, the past resurfaces, and there are enough sparks, raunch, and romance to change all their lives in unexpected ways.

programme.title: Ezra
programme.desc: Comedian Max co-parents autistic son Ezra with ex-wife Jenna. Faced with crucial decisions about Ezras future, Max and Ezra go on a life-changing cross-country road trip.

programme.title: Greedy People
programme.desc: Residents of a small island town navigate a murder and the discovery of a million dollars, a series of increasingly bad decisions upend the once peaceful community.

programme.title: Wonka
programme.desc: Based on the extraordinary character at the center of Charlie and the Chocolate Factory, Wonka tells the wondrous story of how the worlds greatest inventor, magician and chocolate-maker became the beloved Willy Wonka we know today. A young Willy Wonka, chock-full of ideas and determined to change the world one delectable bite at a time - proving that the best things in life begin with a dream, and if youre lucky enough to meet Willy Wonka, anything is possible.

programme.title: I.S.S.
programme.desc: Tensions flare in the near future aboard the International Space Station as a conflict breaks out on Earth. Reeling, the U.S. and Russian astronauts receive orders from the ground - take control of the station by any means necessary.

programme.title: Watchmen: Chapter I
programme.desc: In an alternate world, the murder of a government sponsored superhero draws his outlawed colleagues out of retirement, into a mystery that threatens their lives and the world itself.

programme.title: Watchmen: Chapter II
programme.desc: Former heroes face threats. The Comedian is dead, Dr. Manhattan exiled to Mars, Ozymandias survived an attack and Rorschach is arrested.

programme.title: Bad Boys: Ride or Die
programme.desc: The worlds favourite Bad Boys are back with their iconic mix of edge-of-your seat action and outrageous comedy, but this time with a twist: Miamis finest are now on the run.

programme.title: Smile 2
programme.desc: About to embark on a world tour, global pop sensation Skye Riley begins experiencing increasingly terrifying and inexplicable events. Overwhelmed by the escalating horrors and the pressures of fame, Skye is forced to face her past.

programme.title: Speak No Evil
programme.desc: A dream holiday turns into a living nightmare when an American couple and their daughter spend the weekend at a British familys idyllic country estate.

programme.title: Theres Something in the Barn
programme.desc: Bill moves his family to Norway after inheriting a remote estate. However, the family disturbs an unexpected resident: a barn elf who will go to lengths to drive the family away.

programme.title: The Strangers: Chapter 1
programme.desc: When their car breaks down in an eerie small town, a couple must spend the night in a remote cabin. Panic ensues as they are terrorised by three masked strangers who strike with no mercy.

programme.title: Tarot
programme.desc: When a group of friends recklessly violates the sacred rule of Tarot readings, they unknowingly unleash an unspeakable evil trapped within the cursed cards. One by one, they come face to face with fate and end up in a race against death.

programme.title: Longlegs
programme.desc: In pursuit of a serial killer, an FBI agent uncovers a series of occult clues that she must solve to end his terrifying killing spree.

programme.title: Apartment 7A
programme.desc: New York City, 1965. What happened in the apartment before Rosemary moved in? A struggling dancer finds herself drawn into dark forces by a peculiar couple promising her fame.

programme.title: Immaculate
programme.desc: Cecilia, a woman of devout faith, is warmly welcomed to the picture-perfect Italian countryside where she is offered a new role at an illustrious convent. But it becomes clear to Cecilia that her new home harbors dark and horrifying secrets.

programme.title: Abigail
programme.desc: After a group of would-be criminals kidnap the 12-year-old ballerina daughter of a powerful underworld figure, all they have to do to collect a $50 million ransom is watch the girl overnight. In an isolated mansion, the captors start to dwindle, one by one, and they discover, to their mounting horror, that theyre locked inside with no normal little girl.

programme.title: Hypnotic
programme.desc: Determined to find his missing daughter, Austin detective, Danny Rourke instead finds himself spiraling down a rabbit hole while investigating a series of reality-bending bank robberies where he will ultimately call into question his most basic assumptions about everything and everyone in his world. Aided by Diana Cruz, an unnervingly gifted psychic, Rourke simultaneously pursues and is pursued by a lethal specter, the one man he believes holds the key to finding the missing girl only to discover more than he ever bargained for.

programme.desc: About to embark on a world tour, global pop sensation Skye Riley begins experiencing increasingly terrifying and inexplicable events. Overwhelmed by the escalating horrors and the pressures of fame, Skye is forced to face her past.

programme.title: Speak No Evil
programme.desc: A dream holiday turns into a living nightmare when an American couple and their daughter spend the weekend at a British familys idyllic country estate.

programme.title: Theres Something in the Barn
programme.desc: Bill moves his family to Norway after inheriting a remote estate. However, the family disturbs an unexpected resident: a barn elf who will go to lengths to drive the family away.

programme.title: The Strangers: Chapter 1
programme.desc: When their car breaks down in an eerie small town, a couple must spend the night in a remote cabin. Panic ensues as they are terrorised by three masked strangers who strike with no mercy.

programme.title: Tarot
programme.desc: When a group of friends recklessly violates the sacred rule of Tarot readings, they unknowingly unleash an unspeakable evil trapped within the cursed cards. One by one, they come face to face with fate and end up in a race against death.

programme.title: Longlegs
programme.desc: In pursuit of a serial killer, an FBI agent uncovers a series of occult clues that she must solve to end his terrifying killing spree.

programme.title: Apartment 7A
programme.desc: New York City, 1965. What happened in the apartment before Rosemary moved in? A struggling dancer finds herself drawn into dark forces by a peculiar couple promising her fame.

programme.title: Immaculate
programme.desc: Cecilia, a woman of devout faith, is warmly welcomed to the picture-perfect Italian countryside where she is offered a new role at an illustrious convent. But it becomes clear to Cecilia that her new home harbors dark and horrifying secrets.

programme.title: Abigail
programme.desc: After a group of would-be criminals kidnap the 12-year-old ballerina daughter of a powerful underworld figure, all they have to do to collect a $50 million ransom is watch the girl overnight. In an isolated mansion, the captors start to dwindle, one by one, and they discover, to their mounting horror, that theyre locked inside with no normal little girl.

programme.title: Hypnotic
programme.desc: Determined to find his missing daughter, Austin detective, Danny Rourke instead finds himself spiraling down a rabbit hole while investigating a series of reality-bending bank robberies where he will ultimately call into question his most basic assumptions about everything and everyone in his world. Aided by Diana Cruz, an unnervingly gifted psychic, Rourke simultaneously pursues and is pursued by a lethal specter, the one man he believes holds the key to finding the missing girl only to discover more than he ever bargained for.

programme.title: Kraven the Hunter
programme.desc: Kravens complex relationship with his ruthless father starts him down a path of vengeance, motivating him to become not only the greatest hunter in the world, but also one of its most feared.

programme.title: Bloodline Detectives
programme.desc: In 1974, in Fort Worth Texas, 17-year-old Carla Walker kisses her boyfriend Rodney in his car, when suddenly the door is ripped open by an unknown assailant.

programme.title: How I Caught the Killer
programme.desc: In San Francisco, April 1974, Angelo Pavageau broke into the home of Annette and Frank Carlson. He savagely murdered Frank, repeatedly raped and beat Annette, set the house on fire and left her for dead. Annette then helped detectives Frank Falzon and Jack Cleary catch the killer.

programme.title: Ivan Milat
programme.desc: Definitive, compulsive and revelatory, this is the untold true story of serial killer Ivan Robert Marko Milat.

programme.title: Million Dollar Murders
programme.desc: In 1999, Belinda Williams vanished and was found dead days later. Million Dollar Murders uncovers new evidence suggesting she knew her killer, offering a $1 million reward to solve the case.

programme.title: Bloodline Detectives
programme.desc: Through detailed genetic profiling, the cold case of who killed Robin Brooks is finally cracked, years later.

programme.title: The First 48
programme.sub-title: Sudden Death Devil At The Door
programme.desc: In medicine, they call it the critical hour, in criminal investigations, they call it the first 48 hours. Ask any detective - they will tell you that if they dont have a lead, a suspect or an arrest within 48 hours, their chances of solving the case are cut in half. In a visual style that feels more like a TV drama than a verite reality show, this program follows homicide detectives during these initial critical hours as they race against time to solve their cases. The program follows various detectives of a few select homicide teams as they track breaking cases - each with a running clock that builds pace as the 48 hours inexorably expires. In this episode, in New Orleans, a man is executed in broad daylight, and Detective Ryan Vaught must battle fear and distrust on the street to identify the killer. In Minneapolis, when a teenager is murdered at home, Sargent Christopher Gaiters best hope for finding the killer is the victims father, who witnessed the shooting.

programme.title: Bloodline Detectives
programme.sub-title: Kim Bryant - Last Seen At Dairy Queen
programme.desc: In 1979, in Las Vegas, 16-year-old student Kim Bryant is last seen outside a restaurant. Three weeks later, her body is discovered by three teenage boys hiking on the outskirts of town.

programme.title: How I Caught the Killer
programme.desc: On the 29th December 1999, Garry Malone made an emotional TV appeal for his missing wife Sharon to make contact with the police. However, Garry already knew his wife wasnt coming home. When he fled the country, it would take the police another 5 years to bring this killer to justice.

programme.title: Cops Reloaded
programme.desc: Cops Reloaded revisits some of the most memorable suspects, car chases and action-packed moments from televisions popular reality program.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Television cameras follow real-life law enforcement officers and capture the action as they perform their daily duty to serve and protect the public.

programme.title: Murder at My Door
programme.desc: 19-year-old Mundill Mahil lures a young TV executive to his death in an act of revenge following an attempted rape six months earlier.

programme.title: The Real Manhunter
programme.desc: Following ex-detective Colin Sutton, a former senior investigating officer with the Metropolitan Police, as he looks back at his most important cases and the investigations that solved them.

programme.title: Faces of Evil
programme.sub-title: Russell Bishop - The Babes In The Wood Killer
programme.desc: In 1986, Brighton was in fear after the discovery of two young girls murdered in a wood. Russell Bishop avoided justice due to lack of evidence and attacked another young girl.

programme.title: Hours To Kill
programme.desc: Fifty-seven-year-old bookkeeper Barbara Iske is found executed in the driveway of her wealthy clients Michigan home after failing to arrive on time, revealing a dark family conflict.

programme.desc: A forensically trained dentist links a man to his wifes disappearance; a soil expert aids in convicting heritage thieves.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When two boys are viciously attacked during a fishing trip, authorities spring into action. They suspect a group of teenage thugs, but lack solid evidence. It would take the murky waters of a fishing hole to provide clear evidence, and help authorities reel in the boys attackers.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The medical examiner ruled the death an accident, but the detectives investigating the case thought the evidence at the scene indicated otherwise. It would take three years, an exhumation and a second autopsy to determine who was right.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A fire erupts in the Kings Cross Underground Station in London, killing 31 people and injuring dozens more. Arson investigators are able to pinpoint the cause of the fire, but it takes state-of-the-art computer technology and experts in the field of fluid dynamics to explain why it became a deadly inferno.

programme.title: Bloodline Detectives
programme.desc: On the morning of September 4th, 1981, mum of two Linda Slaten is found murdered in her bedroom in her Lakeland Florida flat. Shed been sexually assaulted while her children slept.

programme.title: How I Caught the Killer
programme.desc: The brutal murder on a suburban London street of Geeta Aulakh in November 2009 immediately led the police to suspect her estranged husband Sunny, but he had an alibi. When an informant walked into the police station saying they knew who had murdered Geeta, the police soon uncovered the shocking truth.

programme.title: Cops Reloaded
programme.desc: Cops Reloaded revisits some of the most memorable suspects, car chases and action-packed moments from televisions popular reality program.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Television cameras follow real-life law enforcement officers and capture the action as they perform their daily duty to serve and protect the public.

programme.title: Murdered at First Sight
programme.desc: Most killers know their victims, Murdered At First Sight investigates the alarming rise in "Stranger Murders" and the challenges faced by the police in tracking down the suspect of an entirely random homicide.

programme.title: CI Australia: Families Of Crime
programme.desc: Lennie McPherson controlled most of Sydneys organised crime activity for several decades with his associate George Freeman. Lenny was born in the inner-Sydney suburb of Balmain in 1921, the 10th child of metalworker William McPherson and his wife, Nellie. He had some schooling at Birchgrove Primary School, and his first brush with the law came at the age of 11 when he was convicted of stealing. Eighteen months later he was convicted on two charges of stealing and sent to a detention centre, where he was bashed and raped. He went on to a life of serious crime and was universally feared by his adversaries and often referred to as Sydneys Mr Big of organised crime, protected by police who relied on his information to control the Sydney underworld. McPherson had been estranged from his mother for many years, but on her 70th birthday, he unexpectedly turned up at her flat, carrying a live rabbit. He demanded to know why he had not been invited to her birthday party, and when she admitted that it was because of his criminal activities, the furious McPherson tore the rabbits head off, threw the still-twitching body at her feet and stormed off. He died of a heart attack in Cessnock Gaol in 1996, aged 75. George Freeman was king of Sydneys SP bookies and was involved with McPherson in massive money laundering operations on Sydney race tracks and the corruption of Sydney chief magistrate Murray Farquar. During the 1970s, George Freeman was shot with a .22 pistol but survived, and, less than six weeks later, the man suspected of the shooting was himself shot dead in the driveway of his Coogee home. Freeman, who was holidaying in Noosa at the time, refused to answer questions on the matter.

programme.title: Homicide With Ron Iddles
programme.desc: One of Australias greatest detectives reveals the untold stories of his most challenging cases. This series takes you behind the news headlines, on a minute-by-minute journey with Ron Iddles.

programme.title: Hours To Kill
programme.desc: Devoted father Tray Phelps is murdered steps from his front door in Mississippi. With no immediate leads, Missouri investigators must uncover the master manipulator behind a twisted family plot.

programme.title: Murdered at First Sight
programme.desc: Most killers know their victims, Murdered At First Sight investigates the alarming rise in "Stranger Murders" and the challenges faced by the police in tracking down the suspect of an entirely random homicide.

programme.title: Expert Witness
programme.desc: A forensic archaeologist helps catch a Wiltshire womans killer; an insect expert reveals neglect in a Welsh teenagers case.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A young prostitute was found strangled to death in an icy Ohio waterway. While the sex-for-hire business means coming into daily contact with many customers, some of who have a history of violence, this crime was complicated by the fact that two local policemen had been romantically involved with the victim. Water had rinsed the victims body of possible hair and fibre evidence, but investigators found one clue, which provided an important detail about the last car in which she rode.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a hit-and-run boating accident caused the death of a popular young man, investigators faced the daunting task of searching for one boat among 1200 others. They asked anyone who had seen the accident to come forward. The man who responded did much more than witness the crash; he was a passenger in that other boat.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The investigation of a discarded sleeping bag, containing bloody sneakers and a purse, leads police to the body of a young woman. Evidence from the autopsy and the crime scene was carefully collected and analysed, but it would be a mark found on the victims body which would enable police to track the killer.

programme.sub-title: Russell Bishop - The Babes In The Wood Killer
programme.desc: In 1986, Brighton was in fear after the discovery of two young girls murdered in a wood. Russell Bishop avoided justice due to lack of evidence and attacked another young girl.

programme.title: Expert Witness
programme.sub-title: Fragments Of Truth And Wall Of Evidence
programme.desc: A forensically trained dentist links a man to his wifes disappearance; a soil expert aids in convicting heritage thieves.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When two boys are viciously attacked during a fishing trip, authorities spring into action. They suspect a group of teenage thugs, but lack solid evidence. It would take the murky waters of a fishing hole to provide clear evidence, and help authorities reel in the boys attackers.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The medical examiner ruled the death an accident, but the detectives investigating the case thought the evidence at the scene indicated otherwise. It would take three years, an exhumation and a second autopsy to determine who was right.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A fire erupts in the Kings Cross Underground Station in London, killing 31 people and injuring dozens more. Arson investigators are able to pinpoint the cause of the fire, but it takes state-of-the-art computer technology and experts in the field of fluid dynamics to explain why it became a deadly inferno.

programme.title: The First 48
programme.sub-title: Sudden Death Devil At The Door
programme.desc: In medicine, they call it the critical hour, in criminal investigations, they call it the first 48 hours. Ask any detective - they will tell you that if they dont have a lead, a suspect or an arrest within 48 hours, their chances of solving the case are cut in half. In a visual style that feels more like a TV drama than a verite reality show, this program follows homicide detectives during these initial critical hours as they race against time to solve their cases. The program follows various detectives of a few select homicide teams as they track breaking cases - each with a running clock that builds pace as the 48 hours inexorably expires. In this episode, in New Orleans, a man is executed in broad daylight, and Detective Ryan Vaught must battle fear and distrust on the street to identify the killer. In Minneapolis, when a teenager is murdered at home, Sargent Christopher Gaiters best hope for finding the killer is the victims father, who witnessed the shooting.

programme.title: Bloodline Detectives
programme.sub-title: Kim Bryant - Last Seen At Dairy Queen
programme.desc: In 1979, in Las Vegas, 16-year-old student Kim Bryant is last seen outside a restaurant. Three weeks later, her body is discovered by three teenage boys hiking on the outskirts of town.

programme.title: Hours To Kill
programme.desc: Fifty-seven-year-old bookkeeper Barbara Iske is found executed in the driveway of her wealthy clients Michigan home after failing to arrive on time, revealing a dark family conflict.

programme.title: How I Caught the Killer

programme.title: Bloodline Detectives
programme.desc: On the morning of September 4th, 1981, mum of two Linda Slaten is found murdered in her bedroom in her Lakeland Florida flat. Shed been sexually assaulted while her children slept.

programme.title: How I Caught the Killer
programme.desc: The brutal murder on a suburban London street of Geeta Aulakh in November 2009 immediately led the police to suspect her estranged husband Sunny, but he had an alibi. When an informant walked into the police station saying they knew who had murdered Geeta, the police soon uncovered the shocking truth.

programme.title: Cops Reloaded

programme.title: Cops

programme.title: Murdered at First Sight
programme.desc: Most killers know their victims, Murdered At First Sight investigates the alarming rise in "Stranger Murders" and the challenges faced by the police in tracking down the suspect of an entirely random homicide.

programme.title: CI Australia: Families Of Crime
programme.desc: Lennie McPherson controlled most of Sydneys organised crime activity for several decades with his associate George Freeman. Lenny was born in the inner-Sydney suburb of Balmain in 1921, the 10th child of metalworker William McPherson and his wife, Nellie. He had some schooling at Birchgrove Primary School, and his first brush with the law came at the age of 11 when he was convicted of stealing. Eighteen months later he was convicted on two charges of stealing and sent to a detention centre, where he was bashed and raped. He went on to a life of serious crime and was universally feared by his adversaries and often referred to as Sydneys Mr Big of organised crime, protected by police who relied on his information to control the Sydney underworld. McPherson had been estranged from his mother for many years, but on her 70th birthday, he unexpectedly turned up at her flat, carrying a live rabbit. He demanded to know why he had not been invited to her birthday party, and when she admitted that it was because of his criminal activities, the furious McPherson tore the rabbits head off, threw the still-twitching body at her feet and stormed off. He died of a heart attack in Cessnock Gaol in 1996, aged 75. George Freeman was king of Sydneys SP bookies and was involved with McPherson in massive money laundering operations on Sydney race tracks and the corruption of Sydney chief magistrate Murray Farquar. During the 1970s, George Freeman was shot with a .22 pistol but survived, and, less than six weeks later, the man suspected of the shooting was himself shot dead in the driveway of his Coogee home. Freeman, who was holidaying in Noosa at the time, refused to answer questions on the matter.

programme.title: Homicide With Ron Iddles
programme.desc: One of Australias greatest detectives reveals the untold stories of his most challenging cases. This series takes you behind the news headlines, on a minute-by-minute journey with Ron Iddles.

programme.title: Hours To Kill
programme.desc: Devoted father Tray Phelps is murdered steps from his front door in Mississippi. With no immediate leads, Missouri investigators must uncover the master manipulator behind a twisted family plot.

programme.title: Expert Witness
programme.desc: A forensic archaeologist helps catch a Wiltshire womans killer; an insect expert reveals neglect in a Welsh teenagers case.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A young prostitute was found strangled to death in an icy Ohio waterway. While the sex-for-hire business means coming into daily contact with many customers, some of who have a history of violence, this crime was complicated by the fact that two local policemen had been romantically involved with the victim. Water had rinsed the victims body of possible hair and fibre evidence, but investigators found one clue, which provided an important detail about the last car in which she rode.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a hit-and-run boating accident caused the death of a popular young man, investigators faced the daunting task of searching for one boat among 1200 others. They asked anyone who had seen the accident to come forward. The man who responded did much more than witness the crash; he was a passenger in that other boat.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The investigation of a discarded sleeping bag, containing bloody sneakers and a purse, leads police to the body of a young woman. Evidence from the autopsy and the crime scene was carefully collected and analysed, but it would be a mark found on the victims body which would enable police to track the killer.

programme.title: The First 48
programme.sub-title: Room For The Night Down And Out
programme.desc: In medicine, they call it the critical hour, in criminal investigations, they call it the first 48 hours. In this episode, Detective Rob Barrere investigates when three men meet in a motel room in New Orleans east, and one of them ends up dead, while in Tulsa, Detective Ronnie Leatherman catches the case of a man stabbed 21 times when a night of drinking ignites a murderous rage.

programme.title: Bloodline Detectives
programme.sub-title: Diana Hanson - Mystery Of The Headphones
programme.desc: Diana Hanson, 22, fails to return home to Las Vegas. Her worried parents call police, but in a devastating turn of events, news of a brutal murder scene emerges within 24 hours.

programme.title: Dogfights
programme.desc: US Air Force fighter pilots risk their lives flying sleek F-86 Sabres above MIG Alley - the most dangerous piece of sky in the Korean War.

programme.title: Empires of Stone
programme.desc: Empires of Stone reveals to its audience the Great Wall of China as it has never been seen or understood before. It is the history of a nation written in the earth and stone of battlements and ruins that stretch in total for 50,000km -a feat of engineering without equal any where in the world at any time.

programme.title: Rise Of The Dictators
programme.desc: Rise of the Dictators is the story of Adolf Hitler, Benito Mussolini, and Josef Stalin; but also reveals those strong men, autocrats, and despots that followed in their footsteps.

programme.title: Line of Fire
programme.desc: Explore the facts which shape nearly 2000 years of human conflict through state-of-the-art animation and expert analysis by military historians.

programme.title: Dogfights
programme.desc: A courageous, ragtag band of American mercenaries dare to challenge the overwhelming might of the Japanese Air Force. The legendary Flying Tigers slash through the skies of China, and help vanquish the unstoppable Japanese.

programme.title: Secrets of World War II
programme.sub-title: How Germany was Bombed to Defeat
programme.desc: A thousand bomber raids flown by the US airforce by day and the same by British RAF by night. The result was a firestorm which destroyed German cities, industry and communications.

programme.title: History of Warfare
programme.desc: This is the story of the bloody conflicts between the Greeks and Persians which lasted for more than 50 years in the fourth century BC. It includes the famous battle of Marathon, a victory which echoed down the years, as well as Thermopylae, where the Spartans made a heroic defence of the pass. It was not until 449 BC that the Persians abandoned all hopes of annexing Greece.

programme.title: Time Team
programme.desc: The villagers of Bitterley believe an empty field used to be full of houses and streets. They call in Tony and the team to see if theyre right. But theyre not expecting the professionals to do all the work.

programme.title: Walking Tudor England
programme.desc: Suzannah walks through the heart of England, from Kenilworth in Warwickshire to Stamford in Lincolnshire to uncover the stories behind the reign of Queen Elizabeth I.

programme.title: American Dynasty
programme.desc: Explores the evolving narrative of America through the stories of some of the nations most famous families.

programme.title: Ancient Egypt By Train
programme.desc: Professor Alice Roberts uses one of the worlds oldest rail networks to explore one of the worlds most ancient civilisations.

programme.title: Lost Cities of the Trojans
programme.desc: For centuries, the Trojan War has been regarded simply as a myth, a story of the siege and eventual destruction of the ancient city of Troy. Investigators explore new evidence that may uncover the truth.

programme.title: History Uncovered
programme.desc: The image of the Resistance that has gone down in history is one of Partisans struggling on their own against the Nazi occupiers. And yet, in many occupied countries, clandestine networks were mobilized, organized and funded by a secret British organization, the S.O.E. (Special Operations Executive). Wanting to defend other nations freedom while also aiding Britains strategic interests, their contributions sometimes turned into interference that shaped the post-war period. For better and for worse.

programme.title: Ancient Egypt By Train
programme.desc: Professor Alice Roberts uses one of the worlds oldest rail networks to explore one of the worlds most ancient civilisations.

programme.title: Line of Fire
programme.desc: During the years 58 to 51 BC, the great Roman general Julius Caesar led a series of brutal and bloody campaigns against the Celtic tribes of Gaul. Under the leadership of Vercingetorix, the Gallic Celts withstood the might of the Legions until 52 BC. It was then that the Romans, using an ingenious double earthwork, penned Vercingetorix in a hill-fort at Alesia and forced his surrender, virtually ending the Gallic Wars. Vercingetorix was taken to Rome and executed.

programme.title: Dogfights
programme.desc: August 1942: Heroic, die-hard pilots of the tiny Cactus Air Force match skills and instincts against top Japanese aces as they battle in the skies above Guadalcanal.

programme.title: Secrets of World War II
programme.desc: Had it not been winter, North Americas vast western forests, farms, and cities might have been decimated by a secret weapon sent in across the Pacific by the Japanese.

programme.title: History of Warfare
programme.desc: This is the story of General Andrew Jacksons great victory over a British army commanded by Sir Edmund Packenham during the war of 1812. The British landed at New Orleans in an attempt to win decisive control over the Mississippi valley, but Jackson, aided by the French pirate Jean Laffitte, constructed formidable fortifications. During the fight which followed, only 71 American troops became casualties, while the losses on the British side amounted to some 2000. The British cause was lost and they soon embarked for home.

programme.title: Time Team
programme.desc: The team head to one of Britains most easterly points - Dunwich. Its a village that is literally falling off the edge of the UK, with coastal erosion having eaten away most of a once bustling settlement.

programme.title: Walking Tudor England
programme.desc: Suzannah is in London walking along some of the most scenic stretches of the River Thames between Greenwich and Hampton Court Palace, Henry VIIIs magnificent pleasure palace.

programme.title: Ancient Powers
programme.desc: Each episode uses the very latest scientific and archaeological discoveries to reveal the tools, technologies, strategies and systems that decided the fate of the ancient world.

programme.title: Digging For Britain
programme.sub-title: East: Saxon Gold and Buried Coins
programme.desc: The most incredible grave goods ever found: a strange Roman sarcophagus filled with plaster and an intriguing medieval coin hoard.

programme.title: 48 Hours to Victory
programme.desc: Explores how the Duke of Wellington got the better of Napoleon at the Battle of Waterloo.

programme.title: WWII: Witness To War
programme.desc: The decision by Hitler to send his armies east in to Russia was probably the most significant of the war. Now against military convention, he was fighting on two fronts and almost as bad made a bitter enemy of an erstwhile ally. In 1812, Napoleon had sent his troops into Russia under-prepared for Russian winters and hundreds of thousands of his troops perished; now Hitler was about to do the same. The failure to take Moscow and the long, but unsuccessful sieges and Stalingrad and Leningrad cost the Wehrmacht dear; to those under siege it seemed like Earth had transformed itself into hell. Despite near starvation and countless deaths, they somehow survived to see the German army thrown back towards Germany, being chased all the way a Red Army thirsting for revenge. The retreat towards Berlin saw atrocities committed against Russian villagers that were seen by the pursuing Red army and that filled them with yet more hatred. Even the biggest tank battle in history -at Kursk - could not stem the Russian tide.

The British landed at New Orleans in an attempt to win decisive control over the Mississippi valley, but Jackson, aided by the French pirate Jean Laffitte, constructed formidable fortifications. During the fight which followed, only 71 American troops became casualties, while the losses on the British side amounted to some 2000. The British cause was lost and they soon embarked for home.

programme.title: Time Team
programme.desc: The team head to one of Britains most easterly points - Dunwich. Its a village that is literally falling off the edge of the UK, with coastal erosion having eaten away most of a once bustling settlement.

programme.title: Ancient Powers
programme.desc: Each episode uses the very latest scientific and archaeological discoveries to reveal the tools, technologies, strategies and systems that decided the fate of the ancient world.

programme.title: Digging For Britain
programme.sub-title: East: Saxon Gold and Buried Coins
programme.desc: The most incredible grave goods ever found: a strange Roman sarcophagus filled with plaster and an intriguing medieval coin hoard.

programme.title: 48 Hours to Victory
programme.desc: Explores how the Duke of Wellington got the better of Napoleon at the Battle of Waterloo.

programme.title: WWII: Witness To War
programme.desc: The decision by Hitler to send his armies east in to Russia was probably the most significant of the war. Now against military convention, he was fighting on two fronts and almost as bad made a bitter enemy of an erstwhile ally. In 1812, Napoleon had sent his troops into Russia under-prepared for Russian winters and hundreds of thousands of his troops perished; now Hitler was about to do the same. The failure to take Moscow and the long, but unsuccessful sieges and Stalingrad and Leningrad cost the Wehrmacht dear; to those under siege it seemed like Earth had transformed itself into hell. Despite near starvation and countless deaths, they somehow survived to see the German army thrown back towards Germany, being chased all the way a Red Army thirsting for revenge. The retreat towards Berlin saw atrocities committed against Russian villagers that were seen by the pursuing Red army and that filled them with yet more hatred. Even the biggest tank battle in history -at Kursk - could not stem the Russian tide.

programme.title: Time Team
programme.desc: Eight-hundred years ago the people of Kenfig on the south coast of Wales thought they had built the perfect town, but then it vanished, leaving just a few castle walls to mark its existence.

programme.title: Line of Fire
programme.desc: During the years 58 to 51 BC, the great Roman general Julius Caesar led a series of brutal and bloody campaigns against the Celtic tribes of Gaul. Under the leadership of Vercingetorix, the Gallic Celts withstood the might of the Legions until 52 BC. It was then that the Romans, using an ingenious double earthwork, penned Vercingetorix in a hill-fort at Alesia and forced his surrender, virtually ending the Gallic Wars. Vercingetorix was taken to Rome and executed.

programme.title: Dogfights
programme.desc: August 1942: Heroic, die-hard pilots of the tiny Cactus Air Force match skills and instincts against top Japanese aces as they battle in the skies above Guadalcanal.

programme.title: Ancient Powers
programme.desc: Each episode uses the very latest scientific and archaeological discoveries to reveal the tools, technologies, strategies and systems that decided the fate of the ancient world.

programme.title: Digging For Britain
programme.sub-title: East: Saxon Gold and Buried Coins
programme.desc: The most incredible grave goods ever found: a strange Roman sarcophagus filled with plaster and an intriguing medieval coin hoard.

programme.title: Line of Fire
programme.desc: The story of the great warrior king of Egypt and his struggle for control in the Middle East. This program explores the momentous battle with the Hittites at Qadesh in 1296 BC, the bloody culmination of a campaign that had seen Ramases and his troops march almost 1500km in a month to meet the army of King Muwatallis.

programme.title: Dogfights
programme.desc: The US Navys top fighter, the F8 Crusader, flown by skilled fighter jocks, tackles the fierce North Vietnamese MiG over the killing skies of Vietnam.

programme.title: Secrets of World War II
programme.desc: Hitlers ultimate goal was to produce a rocket capable of carrying an atomic weapon weighing five tons.

programme.title: History of Warfare
programme.desc: This is the story of a soldiers life in the trenches of the Western Front during the Great War. For the millions of volunteer troops, the war which started as a great adventure - an opportunity to do your bit for King and country - ended in the nightmare of the mud-filled trenches of Flanders and Picardy. For those who survived, life would never be the same.

programme.title: Dogfights
programme.desc: US Air Force fighter pilots risk their lives flying sleek F-86 Sabres above MIG Alley - the most dangerous piece of sky in the Korean War.

programme.title: Empires of Stone
programme.desc: Empires of Stone reveals to its audience the Great Wall of China as it has never been seen or understood before. It is the history of a nation written in the earth and stone of battlements and ruins that stretch in total for 50,000km -a feat of engineering without equal any where in the world at any time.

programme.title: Rise Of The Dictators
programme.desc: Rise of the Dictators is the story of Adolf Hitler, Benito Mussolini, and Josef Stalin; but also reveals those strong men, autocrats, and despots that followed in their footsteps.

programme.title: Line of Fire
programme.desc: Explore the facts which shape nearly 2000 years of human conflict through state-of-the-art animation and expert analysis by military historians.

programme.title: Dogfights
programme.desc: A courageous, ragtag band of American mercenaries dare to challenge the overwhelming might of the Japanese Air Force. The legendary Flying Tigers slash through the skies of China, and help vanquish the unstoppable Japanese.

programme.title: Secrets of World War II
programme.sub-title: How Germany was Bombed to Defeat
programme.desc: A thousand bomber raids flown by the US airforce by day and the same by British RAF by night. The result was a firestorm which destroyed German cities, industry and communications.

programme.title: History of Warfare
programme.desc: This is the story of the bloody conflicts between the Greeks and Persians which lasted for more than 50 years in the fourth century BC. It includes the famous battle of Marathon, a victory which echoed down the years, as well as Thermopylae, where the Spartans made a heroic defence of the pass. It was not until 449 BC that the Persians abandoned all hopes of annexing Greece.

programme.title: Time Team
programme.desc: The villagers of Bitterley believe an empty field used to be full of houses and streets. They call in Tony and the team to see if theyre right. But theyre not expecting the professionals to do all the work.

programme.title: Walking Tudor England
programme.desc: Suzannah walks through the heart of England, from Kenilworth in Warwickshire to Stamford in Lincolnshire to uncover the stories behind the reign of Queen Elizabeth I.

programme.title: American Dynasty
programme.desc: Explores the evolving narrative of America through the stories of some of the nations most famous families.

programme.title: Ancient Egypt By Train
programme.desc: Professor Alice Roberts uses one of the worlds oldest rail networks to explore one of the worlds most ancient civilisations.

programme.title: Lost Cities of the Trojans
programme.desc: For centuries, the Trojan War has been regarded simply as a myth, a story of the siege and eventual destruction of the ancient city of Troy. Investigators explore new evidence that may uncover the truth.

programme.title: History Uncovered
programme.desc: The image of the Resistance that has gone down in history is one of Partisans struggling on their own against the Nazi occupiers. And yet, in many occupied countries, clandestine networks were mobilized, organized and funded by a secret British organization, the S.O.E. (Special Operations Executive). Wanting to defend other nations freedom while also aiding Britains strategic interests, their contributions sometimes turned into interference that shaped the post-war period. For better and for worse.

In search of illegal travellers, weapons, and contraband, theres never a dull moment for the men and women who work for CBP.

programme.title: Border Security: Australias Front Line
programme.desc: Follow officers of the Department of Home Affairs, Australian Border Force, and the Australian Quarantine and Inspection Service, as they enforce Australian immigration, customs, quarantine and finance laws.

programme.desc: In New Zealand, the term Police Ten 7 means Police have arrived on the scene. This unique fly-on-the-wall reality series brims with action as it follows urban cops on the beat.

programme.desc: A runaway driver plays Russian roulette through busy traffic; a speeding driver who lets nothing stop him from getting home has some strong opinions about the police.

programme.title: Bondi Rescue
programme.desc: Welcome to Bondi, home of the weird, wonderful, beautiful, deadly and dangerous.

programme.title: Embarrassing Bodies
programme.desc: Dr Christian meets a transsexual woman who is looking for help to make her face and body more feminine. Dr Dawns treats a young boy with a rare condition that makes his tongue so swollen he cant keep it in his mouth.

programme.title: This Is Where I Leave You
programme.desc: When their father dies, four grown siblings, bruised and banged up by their respective adult lives, are forced to return to their childhood home and live under the same roof together for a week.

programme.title: Her
programme.desc: Set in the Los Angeles of the slight future, this film follows Theodore Twombly, a complex, soulful man who makes his living writing touching, personal letters for other people. Heartbroken after the end of a long relationship, he becomes intrigued with a new, advanced operating system, which promises to be an intuitive entity in its own right, individual to each user. Upon initiating it, he is delighted to meet "Samantha", a bright, female voice, who is insightful, sensitive and surprisingly funny. As her needs and desires grow, in tandem with his own, their friendship deepens into an eventual love for each other. An original love story that explores the evolving nature - and the risks - of intimacy in the modern world.

programme.title: Maid in Manhattan
programme.desc: Marisa Ventura is a struggling single mum who works at a posh Manhattan hotel and dreams of a better life for her and her young son. One fateful day, hotel guest and senatorial candidate Christopher Marshall meets Marisa and mistakes her for a wealthy socialite. After an enchanting evening together, the two fall madly in love. When Marisas true identity is revealed, issues of class and social status threaten to separate them. Can two people from very different worlds overcome their differences and live happily ever after?

programme.title: Definitely, Maybe
programme.desc: Will is a father who decides to tell his daughter the story of how he met her mother, when she starts asking questions about sex and relationships. Will discovers that a second look at the past might also give him a second chance at the future. Its definitely never too late to go back and maybe find a happy ending.

programme.title: Friends with Benefits
programme.desc: Justin Timberlake and Mila Kunis star as best friends who are both coming out of disastrous relationships. They decide to make a friends with benefits pact vowing to stop the casual sex if either become emotionally attached. While the set-up works at first, soon the two friends fall in love and must re-evaluate what they mean to each other.

programme.title: Anyone But You
programme.desc: Bea and Bens initial attraction quickly turns sour until they must pretend to be a couple.

programme.title: Fifty Shades Darker
programme.desc: When a wounded Christian Grey tried to entice a cautious Ana Steele back into his life, she demands a new arrangement before she will give him another chance. As the two begin to build trust and find stability, shadowy figures from Christians past start to circle the couple, determined to destroy their hopes for a future together.

As the two begin to build trust and find stability, shadowy figures from Christians past start to circle the couple, determined to destroy their hopes for a future together.

programme.title: Monster-In-Law
programme.desc: After years of looking for Mr. Right, Charlotte Charlie Cantilini finally finds the man of her dreams only to discover that his mother, Viola, is the woman of her nightmares. A recently-fired national news anchor who is afraid she will lose her son the way she has just lost her career, Viola does everything she can to scare off her sons new fiance by becoming the worlds worst mother-in-law. While Violas long-time assistant Ruby does her best to help Viola execute her crazy schemes, Charlie decides to fight back and the gloves come off as the women battle it out to see just who the alpha-female is.

programme.title: Baby Mama
programme.desc: Kate is a single, successful career woman who wants something more, a baby. But she gets more than she bargained for when she hires Angie, a free spirit from South Philly, to be her surrogate in a hysterical mama match-up. From birth class to baby-proofing, theyre the ultimate odd couple.

programme.title: Bridget Joness Baby
programme.desc: After breaking up with Mark Darcy, Bridget Joness "happily ever after" hasnt quite gone according to plan. Fortysomething and single again, she decides to focus on her job as top news producer and surround herself with old friends and new. For once, Bridget has everything completely under control. What could possibly go wrong? Then her love life takes a turn and Bridget meets a dashing American named Jack, the suitor who is everything Mr. Darcy is not. In an unlikely twist she finds herself pregnant, but with one hitch she can only be fifty percent sure of the identity of her babys father.

programme.title: Suddenly 30
programme.desc: A hilarious flash-forward romance about a pre-teen girl who goes from geek to glamorous. With the help of some magic wishing dust, 13-year-old Jenna Rink becomes 30 and gorgeous overnight, with everything she ever wanted, except for her best friend Matt. Now, this grown woman must create some magic of her own to help the little girl inside find the true love she left behind.

programme.title: French Girl
programme.desc: Gordon, a high school teacher from Brooklyn, goes with his girlfriend and chef Sophie to her hometown of Quebec City, where she is testing for the Michelin 3-star restaurant of Ruby Collins.

programme.title: Pleasantville
programme.desc: Two modern American teenagers are sucked into their television set and end up living in a black-and-white 50s sitcom.

programme.title: Fifty Shades Freed
programme.desc: Anastasia and Christian have settled into a life together, but lingering demons from Christians past threaten to disrupt their happily ever after.
